loans.name: Esperanza Y Fe 1, 2, 3 Group

texts.en:
Yuri is one of the entrepreneurial people from the group Esperanza y Fe (Hope and Faith) 1, 2 & 3. She lives in a simple structure with her long-term partner. She says that her most difficult challenge is building her house.  She plans to continue enjoying her profession of teaching, especially teaching children.

Yuri is excited to be taking out her second loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for 12 years, starting out with her own savings. She operates a small school where she teaches kids early in their childhood.  Yuri plans to use this loan to invest in her business, buying books, chairs, notebooks, and other school supplies. She will use the profits to invest in the school by building a new classroom.  Her dream is to have her own school with more courses. 

This Esperanza associate started the program for the benefits to her business.  Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients generally.  Many of the group's Dominican clients recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti.

Yuri's group is located in the rural area surrounding La Romana, where the sugarcane harvest and tourist industry dominates the economy. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable electricity and unreliable running water that is not safe to drink.

loans.use: To buy books, chairs, notebooks, and other school supplies

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
Rosa Elvira es una madre de familia de 38 años de edad que vive junto a su esposo y a sus dos hijos en el distrito agrícola de Las Lomas, una localidad situada en la región Piura y ubicada a más de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la preparación y venta de comida y chicha de jora (una bebida típica del país que se prepara desde épocas remotas en base a un tipo especial de harina de maíz), ella prepara los alimentos y la bebida en su domicilio y la ofrece en venta en su domicilio los días viernes, sábados y domingos. El negocio tiene buena acogida por la buena sazón con la que prepara sus comidas y a que  la chicha es bastante consumida en la zona, sobretodo en diversas celebraciones y festividades. Además los trabajadores de su localidad tienen por costumbre consumir chicha antes de iniciar sus actividades ya que creen que la bebida les ofrece energía y vigor.

Rosa desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más insumos para seguir preparando comida y chicha, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que le permitan lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Rosa Elvira is a 38 year-old mother who lives with her husband and two children in the agricultural district of Las Lomas which is located in Piura region, more than three hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

Rosa makes and sells meals and 'chicha de jora' (a traditional drink from this country which has been made since ancient times from a special type of corn flour).  She prepares the meals and drink in her home and offers them for sale in her home on Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays.  Her business is very popular because of the good taste of her meals and because 'chicha' is widely consumed in the area, above all during celebrations and festivities.  In addition, the workers in her town are in the habit of drinking 'chicha' before they start work since they believe that it gives them energy.

Rosa would like to expand her business by acquiring more supplies so that she can continue preparing her meals and 'chicha'.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which will allow her to achieve her goal.

loans.use: To expand her business by acquiring more supplies so that she can continue preparing meals and 'chicha'

loans.name: Sta. Ana Group

texts.es: El  grupo se llama “STA. ANA” se encuentra ubicado en Santa Ana Estado de México; Está conformado por 9 integrantes entre ellas está la Sra. Marcelina Esperanza de 48 años de edad quien lleva  25 años de casada. Ella se dedica a vender colchas por catálogo y articulos de manualidades acordes a la temporada, comenta que decidió iniciar su negocio porque los ingresos de su esposo muchas veces no le alcanzaban para cubrir sus necesidades y las de sus hijos. Ella desea salir adelante ya que tiene 6 hijos; 2 hombres y 4 mujeres y una depende economicamente de ella la cual esta estudiando la preparatoria y quiere terminar su carrera de diseño gráfico.
texts.en:
The group is called “SANTA ANA” and is located in Santa Ana, state of México.  It has 9 members.  

Among them is Marcelina Esperanza, 48.  She has been married 25 years and she sells catalogue comforters and seasonal crafts.  

She comments that she decided to start her business because her husband’s income sometimes wasn’t enough to cover all her children’s and her needs.  She wants to get ahead because she has 6 children, 2 boys and 4 girls and one of them still depends on her economically because she’s in high school and wants to finish a career in Graphic Design.

loans.use: To invest in her business.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos tiene 66 de edad, es casado y reside junto a su esposa en el distrito agrícola de Las Lomas, una localidad situada en la región Piura y ubicada a más de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores agrícolas desde que era joven, el cuenta con una parcela de cultivo en donde suele sembrar mango y arroz, el cuenta con mucha experiencia en estas actividades y conoce bastante sobre el manejo de cultivos. Los ingresos que recibe de estas actividades los utiliza para ayudar a su familia a salir adelante. Su esposa trabaja criando y vendiendo gallinas y patos.

Santos desea adquirir fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a sus cultivos y asegurarse una buena cosecha, por ello ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Santos is 66 years old.  He is married and lives with his wife in the agricultural district of Las Lomas, in Piura region, more than three hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

Santos has been farming since he was young.  He has a plot of land where he grows mangos and rice.  He has a lot of experience in these activities and he knows quite a bit about looking after crops.  He uses the profits he makes from these activities to help his family get ahead.  His wife works raising and selling chickens and ducks.

Santos would like to acquire fertilizers for his crops so that he can guarantee a good harvest.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which will help him achieve his goal.

loans.use: To acquire fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge  N. P. vecino de la Comunidad de Canalete de Alajuela, muy conocido por sus trabajos de Soldadura. 
Hace pocos años,  el aprovechando sus conocimientos en soldadura y con unos cuantos ahorros inicio su propio taller de soldadura, con el que dado todo tipo de soldadura en su comunidad. Ha sido todo un éxito, sin embargo ya sus pocas herramientas no le permiten satisfacer las exigencias de sus nuevos clientes. Es por eso que Don Jorge necesita un préstamo de ₡600 000(seiscientos   mil colones) para la compra  de nuevas herramientas y de mayor  material que le permita brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
El es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal Canalete, una de las 100 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en:
Jorge N. P. lives in Canalete de Alajuela community.  He is very well known for his welding work.

A few years ago, taking advantage of his knowledge of welding and using some savings, he set up his own welding workshop through which he has been able to offer all kinds of welding work in his community.  It has been a real success but his few tools no longer allow him to satisfy the demands of his new customers.  For this reason, Jorge needs a loan for 600,000 colones so that he can buy new tools and more material which will allow him to provide his customers with a better service.

Jorge is a member of 'Empresa de Crédito Comunal Canalete' (Canalete Communal Credit Company) which is one of the 100 member organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica.

loans.use: Welding materials

loans.name: Yngrid Fiorella

texts.es:
Yngrid es una madre de familia de 21 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a su hijo en el caserío La Coruña del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona ubicada en la región Piura y ubicada a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir para niños, ella cuenta con un stock fijo el cual comercializa entre sus clientes por pedidos. Trabaja tanto al contado como al crédito. Adicionalmente vende cerveza en so domicilio los fines de semana. Estas actividades le permiten sentirse activa y ayudar a su esposo a solventar la economía de su familia.

Yngrid desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más mercadería para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes durante la temporada navideña, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Yngrid is a 21 year-old mother who lives with her husband and son in the village of La Coruña, in the agricultural district of Tambogrande which is located in Piura region, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo.

Yngrid sells children's clothes.  She has a fixed stock which she sells to her customers through an order system.  She sells her products both for cash and on credit.  She also sells beer in her home on weekends.  These business activities allow her to feel active and help her husband with their family's finances.

Yngrid would like to expand her business by purchasing more merchandise so she can satisfy her customer demand during the Christmas season.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa that will allow her to achieve her goal.

loans.use: To expand her business by purchasing more merchandise

loans.name: Anne

texts.en: Anne is a fifty-eight-year-old widow with seven children, and owns a house in Kasese. She has been selling stationary for seven years. She started with a typewriter but now has a photocopier and computer. Her business challenges include high rent and constant power fluctuations. Her vision is to connect to the internet and make her business into a bookstore.

loans.use: To buy stationary

loans.name: Veronica Alexandra

texts.es:
Verónica de 30 años,  debido a los pocos ingresos que tenía para su familia hace años atrás vendió un solar que tenía en el suburbio para ubicar una pequeña papelería en la parte delantera de su casa. 

Viviendo en una zona periurbana y caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y en una ecología en disolución ha podido incrementa la mercadería de la papelería por su buena administración. En la actualidad ya tiene 7 años con su papelería la misma queda junto a un colegio por eso ha tenido buenas ganancias.   Vende cuadernos a $ 1.50, plumas $ 0.30, marcadores, juguetes por la época de navidad.  Trabaja desde las 06h00am hasta el anochecer. 

Para seguir con su negocio ella quiere comprar con el préstamo vitrinas, juguetes, papelería. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa de cemento ya que algunas partes son de ladrillos.
texts.en:
Verónica, 30, because of the little income she had for her family, sold a piece of property years ago that she had in Suburbio to set up a small stationery shop in the front part of her house.

Living in a periurban zone characterized by its unpaved streets and deteriorating environment, she has managed to increase her stock in stationery items thanks to her good administration.  She has been in business for 7 years now.  Her shop is next to a school and because of this her profits have been good.  She sells notebooks for $1.50, pens for $0.30, markers and toys for the Christmas season.  She is open for business from 6am until nightfall.

To stay in business she wants to use the loan to buy display cases, stationery supplies.  In the future she’d like to finish building her house with cement because parts of it is still brick.

loans.use: For display cases, notebooks, beverages.

loans.name: Progresando En Valores 1, 2, 3 Group

texts.en:
Ysabel is the coordinator of her group, Progresando en valores 1, 2, 3 (progress in values). She makes her home in a simple structure with her long-term partner and four children. She says that her most difficult challenge is to finish building a bathroom in her house. In the meantime she continues to enjoy sewing.

Ysabel is excited to be taking her first loan with Esperanza. She has had her business, which she started with some savings, for two years. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying clothing and a sewing machine. She will use the profits to build a bathroom and a kitchen. Her dreams are to work hard and move her business forward, and with the help of God, she will.

This Esperanza associate began with us because she wanted to invest in her business. Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's other Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients. Her group is located in Samana, a lush rugged peninsula with a nascent tourism industry. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable electricity and running water (none of which is potable).

loans.use: To buy clothing and a sewing machine

loans.name: Elvira

texts.es: La señora Elvira  es una cliente antiguo de la institución  esta en la institución desde el año 2003, es un cliente con buena actitud y gran puntualidad en sus pagos, ella se dedica a la venta de polleras y mantas de señora de pollera (la vestimenta de la señora de pollera en la ciudad de la paz es muy particular, ellas llevan una falda gruesa y adentro una pollera delgada que la denominan enaguas, en la parte superior llevan la manta confeccionada con tela de seda y trenzada con flecos en la parte inferior) esta vestimenta es muy particular y solo se puede ver en la ciudad de la paz , ella lo distribuye en todas las ferias de la ciudad de el alto, su trabajo es sacrificado por todos los días tiene que ambular y repartir su mercadería en toda la ciudad de el alto, pero también tiene su puesto fijo en el cual vende su mercadería, ellos tiene un hijo que esta en colegio le dan todo el apoyo para su crecimiento personal, su esposo es chofer propietario y el se levanta desde muy temprano y trabaja hasta muy tarde para, solo de esa manera se puede tener ganancias en ese rubro, el crédito será invertido en la compra de mercadería y la compra de una maquina recta para la costura de prendas de vestir, ya que quiere incursionar en la costura de polleras, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Elvira is a longstanding client of the institution.  She’s been with the institution since 2003.  She is a client with a good attitude and great punctuality with her repayments.  She sells sashes and women’s underskirts called “polleras.”  (Women’s “pollera” dress is very particular in La Paz.  They wear a thick skirt with a thin “pollera” underneath that’s called “enaguas.”  On top they wear a sash made from silk material and braided with fringe on the bottom).  This type of clothing is very particular and is only seen in the city of La Paz.  

She sells them in all of El Alto’s markets.  Her work is very demanding because she must perambulate throughout the entire city of El Alto.  However, she also has a fixed stand where she sells her merchandise.

They have a son who’s in school and they provide all the support for his personal development.  Her husband is an owner-driver.  He gets up very early and works until very late because that’s the only way one can make a profit in that particular occupation.

She will use the loan to buy merchandise and a straight-stitch sewing machine to make the clothing because she wants to go into manufacturing “polleras.”  

She is very grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: To buy clothes and an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Pensando En El Futuro 6, 7 Group

texts.en:
Elizabeth is the coordinator of her group, Pensando en el Futuro 6, 7 (Think about the Future). She makes her home in a simple structure with her four children. She says that her goal is to work and enable her children to have better living conditions. In the meantime she plans to continue cooking different dishes.

Elizabeth is excited to be taking her first loan with Esperanza. She will start her business with this loan. She plans to use it to invest in her new beauty salon, by purchasing a hair dryer and some beauty products. 

This Esperanza associate began with us because she needed capital to develop her business and increase her household income. Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's other Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients. Her group is located in Samana, a lush rugged peninsuL. with a nascent tourism industry. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable electricity and running water (none of which is potable).

loans.use: To purchase a hair dryer for her salon.

loans.name: Victoria Bertilia

texts.es:
la sra. Victoria M. tiene 57 años de edad, vive en la colonia Flor del Campo y se dedica a costurar ropa, hace todo tipo de ropa que le piden sus clientes como ser pantalones, camisas, blusas, sacos, vestidos etc.
su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitación, en su negocio tiene todas las herramientas necesarias para la fabricacion de sus prendas de vestir.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de variedad de telas, zíper, hilos, encajes y repuestos para su maquina de costurar,  ya que en todas sus costuras ella pone la tela.
en esta epoca de navidad tiene muchos pedidos y desea comprar todos los materiales necesarios para fabricar todas las prendas que sus clientes le han encargado.
texts.en:
Mrs. Victoria M., 57, lives in the Flor del Campo neighborhood and is a seamstress.  She makes all kinds of clothes that her customers request like pants, shirts, blouses, coats, dresses, etc.

Her business is located in her home.  She has all the necessary tools to make clothing.

She will use the loan to buy an assortment of fabric, zippers, thread, lace and sewing machine replacement parts because she supplies the fabric for all her creations.

During the Christmas season she has many orders and she wants to buy all the necessary supplies to make all the items her customers have ordered.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread, lace, zippers, needles and sewing machine replacement parts.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Mirgia Guadalupe

texts.es:
la sra. Mirgia R. tiene 52 años de edad, vive en la colonia Flor del Campo y se dedica a los servicios de cortes de pelo, aplicacion de tintes, secados de cabello, colorantes, rayitos, pedicure y manicure etc.
tiene un salon de belleza en su casa de habitacion,  la mayoría de sus clientes son sus vecinas, así mismo recibe otros ingresos por la venta de productos por catalogo Avon, Vogue y Lovely, compra al por mayor y la mayoría de sus ventas son por encargo, también elabora y vende Nacatamales los fines de semana.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar cosmeticos y otros materiales para su salon de belleza.
esta es la mejor temporada y no quiere dejar de vender a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mirgia Rodríguez, 52, lives in the Flor del Campo neighborhood and is a hair stylist.  She cuts hair, colors hair, dries hair, applies color, does highlights, manicures, pedicures, etc.

She has a beauty salon in her home.  Most of her customers are her neighbors.  She earns extra income selling Avon, Vogue and Lovely brand catalogue items.  She buys at wholesale and most of her sales are based on orders.  She also makes Nacatamales (Nicaraguan-style tamales popular as weekend fare) on weekends.

She will use the loan to buy cosmetics and other supplies for her beauty salon.

This is the best season and she doesn’t want to stop selling to her customers.

loans.use: To buy dyes, shampoo, hair conditioner, hair treatment ampules, hair clippers, creams, perfumes.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Bruno

texts.es:
El Señor Bruno S. García vive en concubinato y es padre de 6 hijos a los cuales ayuda y apoya en su educación junto a su pareja. Se dedica a la agricultura, su esposa se dedica a educar a sus hijos que aun son muy jóvenes como para poder ayudar en las labores en el chaco, no cuenta con muchos cultivos es por eso que se dedico a la actividad como moto taxista, ya que con los gastos de sus hijos en la escuela son bastante altos, el cuenta con una familia muy humilde pero bastante unida es por eso que ellos tiene la ganas de seguir trabajando y poco a poco mejorar su calidad de vida, son 3 años lo que lleva dentro del sindicato “2 de AGOSTO” en la localidad de Ivirgarzama, en el cual esta hace mas de 3 años como socio activo, el servicio que brinda es rentable por la alta cantidad de personas que solicitan este servicio por la facilidad,  rapidez y eficiencia. El sindicato cuenta con paradas y turnos para cada afiliado, en diferentes puntos de la localidad de Ivirgarzama donde las personas acuden para solicitar dicho servicio.

Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un préstamo de nuestra institución cuyo destino será la compra de una nueva motocicleta, debido a que la que tiene actualmente ya cumplió su ciclo de trabajo y mejorar el servicio a sus clientes lo que le permitirá también mejorar sus ingresos consecuente mente mejorar su calidad de vida y brindar a sus seis hijos una mejor eduacion.
texts.en:
Mr. Bruno S. García is in a relationship and is the father of 6 children who, together with his spouse, he supports with their education.  He is a farmer and his wife educates the children who are still quite young to work in the fields.

He tells us that his crops aren’t very large so he also went into being a mototaxi driver because his children’s school expenses are quite high.  His family is quite humble but very unified and that’s why they want to continue working to gradually improve their quality of life.  He is in the 2 de Agosto transportation syndicate in Ivirgarzama; he’s been an active member for 3 years now.  The service he provides is profitable because of the high number of people who request it due to its ease, speed and efficiency.  The transportation syndicate has its own stops and work shifts for each affiliated member in various locations throughout Ivirgarzama where patrons can go to request the service.

This is the first time the client has obtained a loan from our institution.  He will use it to buy a new motorcycle because the one he has has outlived its useful cycle and he wants to improve customer service which will lead to improved income and consequently to improved quality of life and being able to provide his six children with a better education.

loans.use: To buy work tools.

loans.name: Sara Yvanna

texts.es: La Sra. Sara vive en el municipio de el Torno,   es nacida en el departamento de Potosí, hace unos 20 años que se vino a la ciudad de santa cruz, trabajo desde muy pequeña ayudando a su Mama,  su actividad es la venta de bisutería en el mercado central de la comunidad, hace bastantes años que se dedica a esta actividad, su es poso con el cual tiene dos hijos , se dedica al transporte, de personas(taxi) hace unos 5 años; el destino del crédito es para comprar mercadería de fin de año en cantidad  ya que las ventas se elevan y es en esta época que ella puede ahorrar algo de dinero ya que en los demás meses solo le alcanza para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en: Sara lives in the town of El Torno. She was born in the Potosi department and has been living in the city of Santa Cruz for about 20 years. From a very young age she worked helping her mother. She sells costume jewelry in the community's central market. She has been doing this work for many years. Her husband, with whom she has two children, has worked as a taxi driver for about five years. She will use this loan to buy merchandise for the end of the year in large quantities because her sales increase during this time of the year which allows her to save some money since during the rest of the year she only makes enough to help her husband with the household expenses.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise by the dozen.

loans.name: Santos Pastor

texts.es:
el sr. Santos Pastor M. tiene 52 años de edad y vive en el caserio El Conton, Santos es relojero, su negocio opera bajo el nombre de “ RELOJERIA LASER “ la cual se encuentra ubicada en el mercado San Miguel del Barrio Guanacaste en la ciudad de Tegucigalpa, este un lugar muy estratégico ya que pasa una buena cantidad de personas. En su negocio presta los servicios de Reparación y limpieza de relojes, cambio de baterías, arregla tambien cadenas, aritos y pulseras.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de: relojes, baterías, brazaletes, vidrios, maquinarias de relojes entre otros.
se aproxima la navidad y muchas personas aprovechan para arregalar sus relojes que estan en mal estado tambien para comprar nuevos relojes.
texts.en:
Mr. Santos Pastor M., 52, lives in El Conton.  He is a watch repairman.  His business operates under the name of “RELOJERIA LASER” and is located in the San Miguel market in Tegucigalpa's Guanacaste neighborhood .  This is a very strategic location because many people pass by there.  His business is watch repair, cleaning, battery replacement.  He also repairs chains, earring and bracelets.

He will use the loan to buy watches, batteries, watchbands, watch cover glass, watch works, etc.

Christmas is approaching and many people take advantage of this time to repair their damaged watches as well as to buy new ones.

loans.use: To buy batteries, watch bands, watch cover glass, watch works, new watches.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Edy Orlando

texts.es:
El señor Edy  Orlando tiene 35 años vive con su conviviente y juntos tienen 2 hijos de 5 y 1 año, el señor Edy vive en la comunidad de Vinto chico junto con su hermano, ambos son huérfanos de madre ya se murió hace muchos años, y el padre los abandono cuando todavía eran muy pequeños, pues Eddy trabajando desde muy pequeño ayudaba a su madre con los gastos de la casa.

Eddy se dedica a la producción de la leche cruda, con el préstamo anterior  le fue muy bien ya que ha crecido la cantidad de cabezas de ganado lechero. Actualmente cuenta con 8 cabezas de ganado lechero.
El cliente está muy agradecido por el préstamo que se les otorgo, y por lo tanto solicita nuevamente para la compra de forraje ya que creció su actividad.

Entre sus sueños y metas sigue siendo crecer mucho más en su actividad hasta tener una granja de más o menos 30 cabezas de ganado lechero.
texts.en:
Edy Orlando is 35 years old and has a live-in partner with whom he has two children ages five and one. Edy lives in the town of Vinto Chico with his brother. They are orphans as their mother died several years ago and their father abandoned them when they were very young. Edy worked from a young age to help his mother with the household expenses. 

Edy works in the production of raw milk. He did very well with the previous loan he received. He was able to increase the number of milking cows. He currently has eight milking cows. He is very grateful for the loan he previously received and is now requesting a new loan to buy feed because his business has grown. 

Among his dreams and goals is to continue to grow his business until he can obtain a farm with about 30 milking cows.

loans.use: Purchase feed for cattle.

loans.name: Jesica Maria

texts.es:
la sra. Jesica Maria S. tiene 36 años de edad, vive en la colonia Aurora y se dedica a la venta de golosinas, desayunos y almuerzos, su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado San Miguel de la ciudad de Tegucigalpa. este es un buen punto ya que por aqui pasan muchas personas, su negocio esta abierto de Lunes a Sábado.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de materiales para la fabricacion de sus comidas, ya que si compra al  por mayor obtienen precios mas bajos.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Mrs Jesica Maria S. is 36 years old.  She lives in Aurora district and sells sweet treats, breakfasts and lunches.  Her business is located in San Miguel market in the city of Tegucigalpa.  This is a good location because a lot of people pass through here.  Her business is open from Monday to Saturday.

She will use her loan to buy supplies for making her meals since if she buys these wholesale she can get them at a lower price.  She needs the profits from her business to get herself and her family ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks, beef, pork, chicken, tortillas, butter, oil, vegetables, rice, beans, eggs, chorizos, juice, bread, coffee, condiments, salt, cheese and margarine

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy dairy products and other products

loans.name: Felicita Del Carmen

texts.es: Felicita del Carmen A. D. D. D. 32 años D. edad, resiD. en el departamento D. Ahuachapán, junto a su esposo y dos hijos D. 12 y 13 años D. edad. Felicita posee una venta D. productos plásticos como canastas, masetas en diferentes tamaños, recipientes para colocar comida, recipientes grandes para colocar agua los cuales en El Salvador son llamados “guacales”. Su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado municipal D. Ahuachapán, lugar en el cual cuenta con muchos clientes. Es por esto que Felicita desea poder aumentar sus productos, ya que las ganancias D. este negocio son las que le permiten contar con todo lo necesario para tener una vida digna junto a su familia. Ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad D. productos plásticos en diferentes numeraciones y tamaños, D. manera que pueda aprovechar las ventas D. fin D. año.
texts.en:
Felicita del Carmen A. D. D. is 32 years old.  She lives in Ahuachapán department with her husband and two children aged 12 and 13.  Felicita owns a business selling plastic products such as baskets, different sized plant pots, food containers and big containers for holding water which are called 'guacales' in El Salvador.  Her business is located in Ahuachapán town market where she has a lot of customers.

Felicita would like to be able to increase her products since the profits from this business are what allows her to have everything she needs in order to live a dignified life together with her family.  She is requesting a loan so that she can buy more plastic products in different numbers and sizes so that she can take advantage of her end-of-year sales.

loans.use: To buy plastic products to sell

loans.name: María Del Milagro

texts.es: María del Milagro L. D. M. D. 44 años D. edad, es una persona muy trabajadora y con mucha experiencia en lo que se dedica a hacer, vive en el municipio D. Soyapango, lugar en el cual vive junto a su esposo, una hija y un nieto D. 6 años D. edad. Ella posee una venta D. ropa para hombres, mujeres y niños, la cual esta ubicada en su casa D. habitación, lugar en el cual durante más D. 5 años ha tratado D. seguir adelante con su negocio, ya que es este el que le permite solventar todos los gastos del hogar junto a su esposo, así mismo comercializa las prendas D. vestir D. forma ambulante. María solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad D. ropa, sobre todo ropa para jóvenes la cual esta muy D. moda, lo que le permita ser más fácil D. vender. Esto es vital para María ya que la estabilidad D. su hogar depenD. en gran manera D. las ganancias obtenidas por ella. Para María el bienestar D. su familia es primero, razón por la cual cada día D. 8 D. la mañana a 6 D. la tarD. ofrece su producto y obtener mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
María del Milagro L. D. M. is 44 years old.  She is a very hard-working person who has a lot of experience in her business.  She lives in the town of Soyapango together with her husband, a daughter and a 6 year-old grandchild.  She owns a business selling men's, women's and children's clothing.  Her business is located in her home which is where she has worked to get ahead in her business for more than 5 years.  Her business is what allows her to cover all her household expenses together with her husband.

María also sells clothes as a street trader.  She is requesting a loan so that she can buy more clothes, especially for young people as these are very much in fashion and therefore easier to sell.  This is vital for María since the stability of her household depends to a large extent on the profits that she makes.  For María, the well-being of her family is the most important thing.  This is why she works every day from 8.00am to 6.00pm, offering her products and making more money.

loans.use: To buy clothes to sell

loans.name: María Teresa Martel

texts.es: María Teresa Martel C. D. P. D. 61 años D. edad, vive junto a su esposo con quien resiD. en San Juan Opico en el departamento D. La Libertad. Ella una señora muy alegre y amable, la cual posee muy buenas referencias por parte D. sus amigos y vecinos, ya que se destaca por ser alguien responsable y respetuosa, la cual siempre ha trabajado junto a su esposo por sacar adelante su hogar. María posee una tienda en la cual comercializa todo tipo D. productos D. primera necesidad, en la cual ha trabajado durante años para poder surtirla y D. esta forma obtener todos los beneficios posibles D. su negocio. Es por esto que María, solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con los recursos necesarios para comprar muchos más productos comestibles como: pan, golosinas, huevos y otros más, D. los cuales son los que más se venden, así mismo comprar productos D. primera necesidad para el hogar. Todo esto es con el fin D. mejorar las ganancias obtenidas por la tienda y así poseer un negocio más rentable.
texts.en:
María Teresa Martel C. D. P. is 61 years old and lives with her husband in the town of San Juan Opico, located in the department of La Libertad. She is a friendly and amiable woman whose friends and neighbors speak highly of her. She stands out as someone who is responsible and respectful, who has always worked alongsiD. her husband to keep their family moving ahead. 

María has a store where she sells all sorts of everyday products, She has run this store for years, always varying her merchandise to make the business as efficient as possible. This is why María is now asking for a loan to buy more food products, such as bread, candy, eggs and other items. These are some of her bestselling products. She would also like to buy more household goods. All of this will help her increase her income and make her business more profitable.

loans.use: Purchase of everyday products.

location.town: San Juan Opico, departamento de La Libertad

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy candy, soft drinks and bread to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a plot of land on which to build a house

loans.name: Olga Morena

texts.es: Olga Morena G. D. L. D. 35 años D. edad, resiD. en el departamento D. Ahuachapán, en donD. vive junto a su esposo el cual trabaja vendiendo relojes, y así mismo con dos hijos D. 9 y 11 años D. edad. Olga se dedica a la venta D. ropa para mujeres y hombres, así mismo venD. zapatos y sandalias, y venD. ropa para embarazadas. El negocio se encuentra en el centro D. Ahuachapán, donD. inicia su trabajo desD. las 8 D. la mañana hasta las 6:30 D. la tarD., posee mucha competencia, ya que en este lugar existen diferentes tipos D. ventas, pero en su mayoría son ventas D. ropa en donD. los precios son muy competitivos. Es por esta razón que ella solicita un préstamo con el deseo D. poder aumentar su inventario, y D. esta forma contar con el dinero necesario para comprar por mayor para obtener la ropa y los zapatos a precios más bajos y así vender más barato, lo que le permita contar con más clientes, lo que se traduzca en mayores ganancias y un mayor beneficio para su hogar.
texts.en:
Olga Morena Garcia D. L. is 35 years old.  She lives in Ahuachapán department with her husband who sells watches.  She also lives with her two children aged 9 and 11.

Olga sells women's and men's clothes.  She also sells shoes, sandals and maternity clothes.  Her business is located in the center of Ahuachapán.  She starts work at 8.00am and finishes at 6.30pm.  She has a lot of competition since there are a number of different types of sales businesses here.  Most are businesses which sell clothes and their prices are very competitive.  For this reason, Olga is requesting a loan so that she can increase her inventory and thereby have the necessary money to buy wholesale, obtaining her clothes and shoes at lower prices so that she can sell them more cheaply.  This will bring her more customers which will translate into better profits which will be good for her household.

loans.use: To buy clothes and footwear to sell

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: La señora Celia es cliente nueva su familia. Es integrada de 3 personas su esposo óscar y su hija de 2 años viven en la casa de su mamá, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa en Coroico  los Yungas todos los fines de semana, la mamá de Celia tiene una casa por Coroico la cual le facilita en tener el negocio por ahí y su esposo trabaja en un colegio de conserje y gondolero en el mismo colegio, los padres de Celia le regalaron a su hija un departamento para que vivan cómodamente la cual falta terminar la obra fina  por lo que se solicita este financiamiento kiva para la compra de material de construcción como yeso y pintura, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Celia is a new client.  Hers is a family of three people: herself, her husband Óscar and her 2 year-old daughter.  They live in her mom's house.  Celia sells clothes in Coroico los Yungas every weekend.  Her mom has a house in Coroico which she allows her to live in as she has her business there.  Celia's husband works as a janitor in a school.  Her parents gave her an apartment so that her family could live comfortably.  However, it needs some finishing touches.  Celia is requesting this Kiva loan so that she can buy building material such as plaster and paint.  She is very grateful to our institution for the support which she is being given.

loans.use: To make some finishing touches to her home

loans.name: Marvin Jeovanny

texts.es: Marvin Jeovanny R. G. de 31 años de edad, es un padre de familia muy responsable y dedicada al bienestar de su hogar. Él reside en Cojutepeque, ubicado en el departamento de Cuscatlán, lugar en el cual vive junto a su esposa y tres hijos menores de edad. Marvin posee un taller de mecánica automotriz, el cual esta ubicado sobre la carretera panamericana, la cual es una de las principales calles del país. Desde hace 7 años que él realiza este tipo de trabajo, obteniendo mucha experiencia en el oficio, lo cual le da la ventaja de elaborar un excelente trabajo con sus clientes, los cuales se sienten muy satisfechos con el servicio brindado por parte de Marvin. Él solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar materiales para su taller tales como lijas, pinturas, herramientas, focos, cables y otros insumos más. Todo esto lo hace con el inmenso deseo de poder obtener mayores ganancias, ya que es esta la única fuente de ingresos con la que su familia cuenta, es por ello que Marvin se esfuerza mucho por realizar un excelente trabajo, y de esta manera brindarles todo lo necesario a sus hijos y su esposa.
texts.en:
Marvin Jeovanny R. G. is a 31 year-old father who is very responsible and committed to the well-being of his household.  He lives in Cojutepeque, in Cuscatlán department.  He lives with his wife and three dependent children.

Marvin has a car repair shop which is located on Carretera Panamericana (Panamericana street).  This is one of the main streets in the country.  He has been in doing this work for 7 years, gaining a lot of experience in his trade, which allows him to do excellent work for his customers.  His customers are very happy with his service.

Marvin is requesting a loan so that he can buy material for his shop such as sandpaper, paint, tools, lights, cables, etc.  He does all this with a great wish to make more profits since this is the only source of income that his family has.  For this reason, Marvin works hard to do an excellent job so that he can provide his children and wife with everything they need.

loans.use: To buy tools for fixing cars

location.town: Cojutepeque en el departamento de Cuscatlán

loans.name: Marisol Elizabet

texts.es:
Marisol  ha trabajado como costurera muchos años para poder mantener a sus hijos ya que es madre soltera. Su primera costura fue cuando empezó a trabajar haciendo camisas y pantalones en un taller de costura pero como tenía que trabajar todo el día. Decidió con sus ahorros comprar una máquina de coser y promocionar sus costuras a sus vecinos y amigos.   
Viviendo con sus dos hijos ha convertido una parte de la casa en su taller de costura y confección. Empieza a las 10h00am hacer los pedidos de ropa que tiene pendiente del día siguiente. Ella hace camisas, pantalones, blusas de hombres, mujeres o niños.
Para seguir operando con su máquina de coser ella quiere comprar con el préstamo telas y comprar cemento, arena, bloques para mejorar su casa (como aparece en la foto). En el futuro quiere tener su taller bien espacioso para darles una mejor atención a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Marisol has worked as a seamstress for many years to support her children and her mother who is now single.  She started by making shirts and pants in a workshop but she had to work all day.  She decided to use her savings to buy a sewing machine and promote her own work among her neighbors and friends.

Living with her two children she has converted part of her house into a dressmaking and sewing shop.  She starts working on orders at 10 am that are due the next day.  She makes  pants, blouses and shirts for men, women and children.

So that she can continuing working with her sewing machine, Marisol wants to use the loan to buy fabric, cement, and blocks to improve her house (as  shown in the photo).  In the future she would like to have a spacious area to better serve her customers.

loans.use: Fabric, cement, blocks

loans.name: Sandra Dinora

texts.es: Sandra Dinora B. C., reside en la colonia Alta vista en el municipio de Ilopango, en donde vive junto a su madre y dos hijos menores de edad, los cuales dependen por completo de ella. Sandra posee un taller de corte y confección, en donde se dedica a la elaboración y venta de ropa para damas y caballeros y así mismo prendas de vestir para niños. Esta la comercializa en su casa de habitación, lugar en el cual incluso le hacen pedidos previos, lo cual es muy bueno para Sandra, ya que elabora un número de prendas de vestir las cuales son ganancias seguras, así mismo comercializa sus productos de forma ambulante con el deseo de obtener ganancias extras. Sandra solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar: telas, hilos, botones y otros elementos más los cuales son necesarios para la elaboración de la ropa que comercializa, lo que le permita contar con mayores ventas y de esta forma mejorar su negocio y la estabilidad de su hogar.
texts.en: Sandra Dinora B. C. lives in the Alta Vista neighborhood in the town of Ilopango.  She lives with her mother and two children, both minors, who depend completely upon her.  Sandra has a dressmaking shop where she makes and sells clothing for ladies and gentlemen as well as children's garments.  She runs this business out of her home.  She also takes pre-orders.  This is very good for Sandra, since this way a number of the garments she makes are sure to earn her money. She also travels to sell her products in order to make extra money.  Sandra is asking for a loan with which she can buy cloth, thread, buttons and other items which are necessary to make the clothes she sells.  This will allow her to sell more and improve her business and the stability of her home.

loans.use: Purchase of cloth, buttons, and thread.

loans.name: Salvador Vidal

texts.es: Salvador Vidal A. C., reside en San Juan Opico, ubicado en el departamento de La Libertad, es padre de dos hijos de 11 y 8 años de edad, así mismo vive junto a su esposa quien trabaja vendiendo piñatas. Salvador se dedica a la joyería, negocio en el cual ha trabajado durante 17 años, por lo que es muy conocido por su excelente trabajo y responsabilidad. Salvador solicita un préstamo con el deseo de poder comprar mayor cantidad de oro, así mismo comprar relojes, moldes y otras herramientas más para elaborar este oficio. Lo que más desea Salvador es poder mejorar sus ingresos y de esta forma vivir mejor junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Salvador Vidal A. C. lives in San Juan Opico, in La Libertad department.  He has two children aged 11 and 8.  He also lives with his wife who works selling piñatas.  Salvador makes jewelry, a business in which he has worked for 17 years.  He is very well known for his excellent work and responsibility. 

Salvador is requesting this loan so that he can buy more gold as well as watches, molds and other tools for carrying out his trade.  What Salvador most wishes for is to be able to improve his profits and thereby live more comfortably together with his family.

loans.use: To buy gold and molds for making jewelry

location.town: San Juan Opico, departamento de La Libertad

loans.name: Catalina Arely

texts.es: Catalina Arely L. de 52 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo de 73 años, con el cual reside en el departamento de San Vicente. Catalina posee una venta de productos de belleza tales como perfumes, cremas para el cuerpo y el cabello y otros más. Mucho de estos productos se comercializan por catalogo, de los cuales se venden a crédito, esta es una estrategia que Catalina utiliza para poder asegurar sus ventas aunque en muchas ocasiones es bastante riesgosa. Es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de cosméticos, cremas y perfumes, la cual debe pagar al contado para obtenerla, es por ello que es de mucha importancia obtener el préstamo dado por Integral, para que este le permita aumentar el inventario de su negocio y poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. Catalina es una mujer muy trabajadora, la cual siempre se ha esforzado al máximo por contar con una vida estable.
texts.en: Catalina Arely L., 52 years old, lives with her husband, who is 73 years old, in the department of San Vicente.  Catalina has a business selling beauty products such as perfume, body and hair creams, and other items.  Many of these products are marketed through a catalog, and are sold on credit.  This is the strategy Catalina uses in order to secure her sales, although in many cases, it's rather risky.  For this reason, she is asking for a loan to buy more cosmetics, creams, and perfumes.  To obtain these items, she has to pay for them in cash upfront.  This is why it's very important that she obtain the loan from Integral.  It will allow her to increase her business' inventory and improve her family's living conditions.  Catalina is a very hard-working woman, and has always worked as hard as possible in order to have a stable life.

loans.use: Purchase of personal use products for sale.

loans.name: La Victoria (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal La Victoria se está formado por 8 socias y un socio, quienes laboran en diferentes actividades que les han permitido salir adelante y ayudar en la economía de sus hogares, viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por la belleza de su centro histórico que fue nombrado  patrimonio cultural de la humanidad en diciembre de 1999.

La Señora. Gladis P. vive por el sector de los Trigales  en la ciudad de Cuenca, tiene 28 años y es viuda hace 9 años, tiene 2 hijos de 11 y 9 años de edad, su  hija  estudia en el colegio y su  hijo  en una escuela de la ciudad, tiene casa propia en donde vive muy tranquila con sus hijos.

Doña Gladis se dedica a la venta de productos  de belleza Yanbal, esta actividad la realiza hace 2 años, trabaja de lunes a sábados sin un horario fijo, vende su producto recorriendo puerta a puerta.

Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal, fue invitada por su cuñada, con este crédito va a comprar más cosméticos. Su meta es tener un comedor ya que le gusta mucho el arte culinario.

La Señora Mariana O. vive por el sector de Indurama en la ciudad de Cuenca. Es el  primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal, fue invitada por su suegra.

Nuestra socia tiene 22 años, es casada y aun no tiene hijos. Su esposo labora en un taller de tapicería que es de su propiedad.

Doña Mariana labora hace un año y medio en un gabinete de belleza y no tiene un horario fijo ya que son turnos rotativos, trabaja de lunes a sábados, todo lo que sabe a cerca de la rama de la belleza lo  aprendió en una academia.

El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de herramientas como una máquina para cortar el cabello, tijeras etc., ya que su meta es  tener su propio gabinete.
texts.en:
The La Victoria communal bank consists of eight female members and one male member who work in different businesses that have allowed them to get ahead and help their household economies. They live in different areas of the city of Cuenca, which is known for the beauty of its historic center which was named a World Heritage Site in 1999.

Gladys P. lives in the Los Trigales area of the city of Cuenca. She is 28 years old and has been a widow for nine years. She has two children who are 11 and 9 years old and are in school. She has her own house where she lives peacefully with her children.

Gladys works selling Yanbal beauty products and has been doing so for two years. She works from Monday to Saturday without a fixed schedule, selling her products door-to-door.

This is her first loan through the communal bank. She was invited by her sister-in-law and will use this loan to purchase more cosmetics. Her goal is to have a dining area since she likes culinary art a lot.

Mariana O. lives in the Indurama area of the city of Cuenca. This is her first loan through the communal bank and she was invited by her mother-in-law.

She is 22 years old, married, and does not have children yet. Her husband works in an upholstery workshop which he owns.

Mariana has worked for a year and a half at a beauty parlor. She works Monday through Saturday but does not have a fixed schedule because they are rotating shifts. Everything that she knows about the business, she learned at an academy.

She will invest the money from the loan in the purchase of tools such as a hair trimming machine, scissors, etc. since her goal is to have her own salon.

loans.use: To purchase creams, perfumes, jewelry / hair trimming machine, scissors, combs, brushes, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy various products for her mini-bazaar

loans.name: Martha Patricia

texts.es:
La Señora. Martha M. es socia del banco comunal Génesis, vive por la parroquia de Chiquintad en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por la belleza de sus calles, sus iglesias hacen de esta una ciudad religiosa, su gente es muy calida y amable.

Doña Martha se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de manualidades como son muñecas, adornos de cocina, adornos de cerámica etc., actividad que realiza hace 8 meses y vende sus productos recorriendo la ciudad, trabaja muy poco debido a que sufre de insuficiencia renal lo que le limita en sus actividades diarias.

La Señora. Martha tiene 42 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 14, 12 y 9 años de edad, sus dos primeras hijas  estudian en el colegio y su ultimo hijo en una escuela de la ciudad. Su esposo es maestro gasfitero, con el trabajo conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia.

Es socia de la banca comunal hace 12 años y todos los créditos le han beneficiado en su trabajo y en su hogar,  su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de mas mercadería. Su meta es de volver a  tener su lubricadora la misma que ha perdido por gastos de su enfermedad.
texts.en:
Martha M. is a member of the Génesis community bank.  She lives in the city of Cuenca in the parish of Chiquintad.  The city is well known for the beauty of its streets and its many churches.  The people are very warm and friendly.

For the last 8 months, Doña Martha has been selling different kinds of handicrafts, such as dolls, kitchen decorations, ceramic objects, etc.  She sells her products around the city, but she works very little because she has kidney failure, which limits her daily activities.

Martha is 42 years old and has three children, who are 14, 12, and 9 years old.  The two eldest are daughters, who are in school, while the third, a son, studies in the city.  Her husband is a master gasfitter.  They live in a house they built together.

She has been a member of the community bank for 12 years, and all of her previous loans have helped her in her work and housekeeping.  She will use the latest loan to buy more merchandise.  Her goal is to get back the oil changing business she lost because of expenses related to her illness.

loans.use: To buy dolls, kitchen decorations, ceramic objects, etc.

loans.name: Maria Aminda

texts.es:
la sra. Maria V. tiene 59 años de edad, vive en la colonia Miller y se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado San Miguel frente a la calle principal,  atiende su negocio todos los días de la semana, desde las 7:00 am hasta las 5:00 pm.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de frutas y verduras como ser: minimos, platanos, aguacates, mangos, uvas, peras, manzanas, limones, naranjas, guayabas, manzanilla. 
en esta temporada se venden mucho las uvas, peras y manzanas.
las ganancias las necesita para cubrir sus gastos y los de su hogar.
texts.en: Maria V. is 59 years old and she lives in the Miller colony. She sells fruits and vegetables in the San Miguel market, next to a principal thoroughfare. She works every day of the week from 7 am until 5 pm. She will use her loan to purchase fruits and vegetables, such as: berries, bananas, avocados, mangos, grapes, pears, apples, lemons, oranges, guavas, and crab apples. During this time of year grapes, pears and apples are big sellers. She needs her earnings to cover her personal and the household expenses.

loans.use: To purchase fruits and vegetables.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase clothing for resale.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
la sra. Martha R. S. tiene 52 años de edad, vive en la colonia Flor del Campo y se dedica a la produccion y venta de tortillas, dichas tortillas son por encargo ya que son especiales para elaborar TACOS FRITOS, asi mismo elabora para la venta en su casa de habitación en la Colonia Flor del Campo.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de los materiales para la fabricacion de sus tortillas.
las ganancias las necesita para comprar unos materiales de construccion para remodelas unas paredes en su casa de habitacion, ya que con las fuertes lluvias de los meses de septiembre y octubre su casa se vio afectada.
texts.en:
Mrs. Martha Ramírez S., 52, lives in the Flor del Campo neighborhood and is a tortilla merchant.  The tortillas are sold by special order because they are special and used to make Tacos Fritos (fried tacos).  She makes the tortillas in her house located in Flor del Campo.

She will use the loan to buy tortilla making ingredients.

She needs the profits to buy building materials and supplies to repair some of the walls in her house because they were damaged by the heavy rainfall in September and October.

loans.use: To buy firewood, flour, water, lime powder.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Katherine Yuliana

texts.es:
Katherine de 19 años, empezó a relacionarse con clientes del sector desde que sus padres tuvieron una tienda cuando ella era pequeña. Debido a que se caso muy joven sus padres le ayudaron para que pusiera una pequeña tienda donde ella vivía con su esposo y su hijo. 

En la actualidad vive en una zona periurbana llamada Perimetral ubicada a sus alrededores un estero. Ella tiene pocos productos pero  surtida su tienda para que sus clientes estén satisfechos cuando van a comprar.  Trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 21h00pm vendiendo arroz, lácteos, enlatados, bebidas.  

Para seguir con su mercadería surtida ella quiere comprar con el préstamo arroz, enlatados, lácteos, bebidas. En el futuro quiere que su tienda sea la mejor del sector y poder construir mejor su casa.
texts.en:
Katherine, 19, started related to local customers every since her parents had a store when she was a little girl.  Because she married very young her parents helped her set up a small store where she lives with her husband and son.

She lives in a periurban zone called Perimetral that is surrounded by a salt marsh.  She has few items but the store is stocked so that her customers are satisfied when they come to buy.  She is open for business from 7am until 9pm selling rice, dairy products, canned goods and beverages.

To continue well stocked with merchandise she wants to use the loan to buy rice, canned goods, dairy products and beverages.  In the future she’d like her store to be the best in the sector so that she can build her house better.

loans.use: For rice, canned goods and dairy products.

loans.name: Nelson Norberto

texts.es: Nelson Norberto G. E. de 33 años de edad, reside en Ciudad Delgado, en el departamento de San Salvador, en donde vive junto a su esposa la cual trabaja comercializando productos varios. Nelson se dedica a la venta de peluches, los cuales comercializa de forma ambulante por colegios, mercados, parques y otros lugares más, los precios son muy accesibles y así también cuenta con diseños muy llamativos. Él solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor variedad de peluches, Nelson espera aprovechar al máximo esta temporada navideña en la que sus ventas aumentan, por lo que desea contar con el dinero necesario para aumentar su inventario.
texts.en:
Nelson Norberto G. E. is 33 years old.  He lives in Delgado City in the San Salvador department. He lives with his wife who works selling various products.  

Nelson sells stuffed animals.  He sells in an itinerant manner; and he sells at schools, markets, parks, and other places.  His prices are very accessible, and he also has very appealing designs.

He is requesting a loan to be able to buy a greater variety of stuffed animals.  Nelson hopes to take the greatest advantage of this Christmas season when sales increase.  That is why he wishes to have the money he needs to increase his inventory.

loans.use: To buy stuffed animals to sell

location.town: Ciudad Delgado en el departamento de San  Salvador

loans.name: María Sara

texts.es: María Sara R. D. T., resiD. en el departamento D. Soyapango, en donD. vive junto a su esposo. María como toda mujer responsable con su hogar, posee un negocio en el cual comercializa: pollo, sopas instantáneas,  verduras y jugos. Su venta se encuentra a las afueras D. su hogar en donD. trabaja día con día para brindarle la ayuda necesaria a su esposo para solventar todos los gastos del hogar. Ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda aumentar su inventario, y D. esta forma contar con más clientes los cuales consuman más D. sus productos.
texts.en:
María Sara R. D. T. lives with her husband in the Soyapango department.  María, like all responsible women, has a business. She sells chicken, instant soups, vegetables, and juice.  Her business is located outsiD. of her house.  She works there day to day in order to give her husband the needed support to pay all of the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan to be able to increase her inventory.  That way she will have more customers who consume more of her products.

loans.use: To buy chicken and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Enrique

texts.es: El señor Enrique nacido el 16 de julio  en Cochabamba, tiene su esposa y 3 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar,  El tiene su pequeña parcela de 2 hectáreas pero como el trabaja fuerte se ve en la obligación de a alquilar más tierras y así poder sembrar mas y tener mas ingresos,   El se dedica a la siembra de ají porque el personalmente lo lleva a Sucre a vender para poder ganar un poco más, También siembra Papa, eso el lo vende en el mercado de El Torno por que no se puede llevar a otro lugar, el dinero del crédito es para lo que implica el gasto del preparado de la tierra la siembra y el traslado de sus productos al mercado, es una persona muy responsable y  trabajadora, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Enrique was born on July 16th in Cochabamba.  He has a wife and three school age children.

He has a small parcel of land that is two hectares.  He is a hard-worker, and he is obliged to rent more land to be able to plant more and get more income.

He grows peppers, and he personally takes them to Sucre to sell in order to earn a little more.  He also grows potatoes, and he sells them at the El Torno market because he is unable to take them to another place.

He will use the loan for the expense of preparing the land for planting and for transporting his products to the market. 
 
He is a very responsible and hard-working person.  He is grateful to the institution for the help provided.

loans.use: For planting peppers and potatoes

loans.name: Elba Marina

texts.es: Elba Marina A. M. de 42 años de edad, reside en el departamento de San salvador, lugar en el cual vive junto a sus dos hijos de 18 y 11 años de edad, los cuales dependen por completo de ella. Elba trabaja muy duro comercializando diferentes tipos de cosméticos, esmaltes, accesorios para el cabello, pulseras y aritos, el negocio esta ubicado en el mercado de Ciudad Delgado, en donde tiene 5 años de trabajar de esta forma. Elba debe esforzarse mucho debido a que no recibe ningún tipo de ayuda para sostener a sus hijos y su hogar. Ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda surtir su venta con todo lo necesario para mejorar sus ganancias y de esta forma darles todo lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Elba Marina A. M., 42, lives in San Salvador department with her two children who are 18 and 11 years of age and are completely dependent on her.  She works hard selling different kinds of cosmetics, nail polish, hair accessories, bracelets and earrings.  The business is located in Ciudad Delgado’s market.  She has been working like this for five years.

Elba must put in quite an effort because she does not get any type of help to support her children or her home.  

She is asking for a loan to stock her store with everything she needs to improve her profits thus providing the best for her children.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: María Ana

texts.es: María Ana N. A. de 44 años de edad, reside en el departamento de San Salvador, junto a sus dos hijos. María se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, así mismo comercializa granos básicos. Desde hace 5 años que ella posee este negocio, el cual esta ubicado en el mercado de Soyapango, en donde sus ventas son bastante estables. Con el deseo de mejorar y salir adelante María solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda surtir sus ventas y de esta forma percibir mayores ingresos. María es una señora muy responsable la cual ha trabajador muy duro durante toda su vida para contar con todo lo necesario para vivir.
texts.en:
María Ana N. A., 44, lives in San Salvador department with her two children.  She sells fruit and vegetables as well as basic grains.  She has had the business for five years.  It’s located in the Soyapango market where all her sales are quite stable.

Wishing to improve and get ahead, María is asking for a loan to stock her sales so as to earn higher income.  María is a very responsible woman who has worked hard her entire life in order to have all that is necessary to live.

loans.use: To buy fruit and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.es: La Sr. Aurelio vive en la comunidad de Santa Martha municipio de el Torno, su actividad es el transporte de personas (taxi), hace unos 3 años  que se dedica a esta actividad, su esposa trabaja como empleada en una institución de la comunidad hace unos dos años, tiene dos hijos en edad escolar, el destino del crédito es para terminar de construir un cuarto, en su domicilio,  se sienten agradecido con la institución por el poyo que se le a brindado.
texts.en:
Aurelio lives in the community of Santa Martha, El Torno municipality.  He is a taxi driver.  He’s been in this occupation for about three years.  His wife has been employed at a community institution for about two years.  He has two school age children.

The loan is to finish building a room at his house.  He is grateful to the institution for the support it has given him.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Jose Ausberto

texts.es:
el señor Jose A. M. tiene 53 años de edad, vive en la colonia San Francisco de la ciudad capital y se dedica al servicio de TAXI, Jose trabaja con su taxi en el punto de trasportes del Mall las Cascadas, tiene un permiso para trabajar en ese lugar y pertenece a una asociacion de taxis llamada ASCAMUNT, son mas de 20 socios, el objetivo es darles transporte a muchas personas que visitan dicho mall.
Jose es casado y tiene 4 hijos.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de repuestos para su automovil, desea dejarlo en buen funcionamiento para darles un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
las ganancias las necesita para cubrir los gastos del hogar y para cubrir con los gastos de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mr. José A. M., 53, lives in the San Francisco neighborhood in the capital city.  He is a taxi driver.  He works with his taxi at the transportation hub at the Las Cascadas Mall; he has a permit to work there and belongs to a taxi syndicate called ASCAMUNT.  It has over 20 members.  The objective is to provide transportation to many people that visit said Mall.

José is married and has four children.

He will use the loan to buy vehicle replacement parts so that it will be in good working order and he can provide better customer service.

He needs the profits to cover household and his children’s expenses.

loans.use: To buy vehicle replacement parts.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Oscar Rolando

texts.es:
El señor Oscar T. tiene 49 años de edad, vive en la colonia la Era de la ciudad de Tegucigalpa.
Oscar se dedica al transporte de personas, tiene un taxi, Oscar trabaja en el punto de taxis del mall las cascadas.
el credito lo utilizara para alquilar un numero de taxi y asi poder poner un carro que tiene destinado para este tipo de servicio.
las ganancias las necesita para cubrir con los gastos del hogar y para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Oscar T. is 49 years old.  He lives in La Era district of the city of Tegucigalpa.  Oscar provides a taxi service.  He works from a taxi stand at Las Cascadas mall.

Oscar will use his loan to pay for a taxi number so that he can use a car that he he has for this type of service.  He needs the profits from his job to cover his household expenses and to get ahead together with his family.

loans.use: To pay for a taxi number

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: Investment

loans.name: Otilia

texts.es: La señora Otilia vive en Pacaya 24 Kilómetros de El Torno,  ella vive y trabaja juntamente con su esposo y sus 2 hijos quienes le ayudan en el sembrado y posterior cosecha de los productos que siembra,  es nacida el 6 de mayo en Chuquisaca. Hace 25 años por motivo de trabajo llego al torno, buscando tiempos mejores, tuvo la suerte de conseguir una pequeña parcela para empezar a trabajar y así después se compro otra parcela que estaba a su lado, compro ganado, ovejas y le va muy bien, con el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de semillas y en lo que es preparado de la tierra, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Otilia lives in Pacaya, 24 kilometers from El Torno.  She lives and works together with her husband and two children who help her to grow and harvest her crops.  She was born on May 6th in Chuquisaca.  Twenty-five years ago, for work reasons, she arrived at El Torno looking for better times.  She was lucky enough to acquire a small plot of land that she could start to work on.  She bought another plot of land beside the first one, bought cattle and sheep, and her business is doing very well.  She will use her loan money to buy seeds and to prepare her land.  She is very grateful to our institution for the support that she is receiving.

loans.use: To burn grasslands and sow corn

loans.name: Angel Celan

texts.es:
el sr. Angel C. tiene 49 años de edad, vive en la colonia Centro America Oeste y se dedica al negocio de Taxi, tiene 3 años de estar con este tipo de actividad, Angel trabaja en el puesto de taxis del mall las cascadas. aqui lleva muchas personas ya que este mall es bastante visitado.
el credito lo utilizara para comprarle repuestos al carro ya que en estos momentos su carro necesita cambio de varias piezas y de no ser asi no puede seguir trabajando con su taxi.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su familia y darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mr. Ángel C., 49, lives in the América Oeste neighborhood.  He’s a taxi driver.  He’s been in this occupation for three years.  Ángel works at the taxi stand at Las Cascadas Mall.  He takes many people there because this mall his very popular.

He will use the loan to buy replacement parts for his vehicle because it currently needs to have some parts replaced.  If this doesn’t happen he won’t be able to continue working with his taxi.

He needs the profits to get ahead with his family and to provide his children with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy vehicle replacement parts.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es: La Señora Roxana se dedica a la venta de ropa para mujer como ser blusas, vestidos y pantalones,  su tienda es muy bonita bien organizada y muy accesible al publico.  La actividad que tiene le sirve para el sustento de su familia y de sus tres hijos ya que ella es la responsable de la educación de ellos y su padre es responsable de la alimentación y vestir ella hace constantes viajes para abastecerse de mercadería ya que su actividad así lo demanda es muy trabajadora por que las veces que pude pasar por el puesto ella siempre está atendiendo personalmente, con el dinero del crédito comprara mercadería para estas fiestas de fin de año ya que su venta se incrementa, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Roxana sells women’s clothes like blouses, dresses and pants.  Her store is very pretty, well organized and accessible to the public.  Her work makes it possible for her to support her family and her three children since she’s responsible for their education; their father covers food and clothing. 

She makes constant trips to stock up on merchandise because her work so requires.  She is very hard working.  One can pass by her stand any number of times and one will always find her tending to customers personally.

She will use the money from the loan to buy merchandise for the end of year festivities because sales increase.  She is grateful to the institution for the support given to her.

loans.use: To buy merchandise and fix up the entire stand.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
la sra. Rosario L. M. tiene 39 años de edad, vive en la colonia Flor del Campo, Rosario se dedica al servicio de moler maiz el cual comienza desde las 4:00 am hasta las 4:00pm todos los días de la semana, con una gran cantidad de clientas que llegan dos veces al día a moler el maiz.
Rosario ahora por ser epoca de navidad desea comprar ropa para vender ya que esta epoca es buena la venta de ropa y tiene una oportunidad de comprar ropa al por mayor a muy buen precio.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa.
las ganancias las necesita para cubrir los gastos del hogar y darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Rosario López Martínez, 39, lives in the Flor del Campo neighborhood.  Rosario provides corn grinding services.  She starts work at 4am and goes until 4pm every day of the week.  A large number of customers come by twice a day to grind corn.

Because the Christmas season is near Rosario wants to buy clothes because clothing sales are very good during this time and she has an opportunity to buy clothes at wholesale at a very good price.

She will use the loan to buy the clothes.

She needs the profits to cover household expenses and to provide her children with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy clothes.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Camilo Zexto

texts.es: EL Señor Camilo tiene dos hijos se dedica a la confección de prendas para varón como ser chamarras, canguros y ropa abrigada, con esta actividad logra el sustento de su familia, su esposa trabaja también elaborando las prendas y comercializándolas en el departamento de Oruro y Potosí por que en estos departamentos existe mayor demanda de sus productos actualmente la familia de con Camilo vive en alquiler, tienen un lote de herencia pero todavía no cuenta con cuartos para por der vivir allá hay planes de hacer construir para vivir en su lote junto sus hermanos, con el dinero del crédito comprara tela por rollos para la confección de sus prendas de vestir, es un joven trabajador, muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Camilo has two children and works making men's clothes such as jackets, 'canguros' (light jackets), and warm clothes.  Through his business he manages to support his family.  His wife also makes clothes and sells them in Oruro and Potosí departments because there is a better demand for her products in these departments.

Camilo's family currently rents a house.  They have inherited a plot of land but they still don't have rooms in which they can live.  They have plans to build on their plot of land so that they can live there together with Camilo's siblings.  Camilo will use his loan money to buy rolls of fabric to make his garments.  He is a hard-working young man who is very grateful to our institution for the support that he is receiving.

loans.use: To buy fabric to increase his working capital

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To invest

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El Sr. José Luis vive en el municipio de el Torno, es nacido en el departamento de Potosí, a su corta edad se vino a vivir al departamento de Santa Cruz, su esposa con la cual tiene dos hijos, se dedica a labores del hogar, su actividad es la producción de ladrillos de construcción, el destino del crédito es para comprar materia prima y para contratar personal para aumentar su producción ya que esta aumentado los pedidos, se dedica a esta actividad hace unos 10 años, viven en la casa de sus suegros por lo que sus metas es comprar un lote de terreno y poder construir su casa.
texts.en: José Luis lives in the town of El Torno.  He was born in Potosí department.  He came to live Santa Cruz department at a young age.  His wife, with whom he has two children, takes care of their household chores.  José Luis' business activity is producing bricks.  He will use his loan to buy raw materials and to hire staff so that he can increase his production since his orders are increasing.  He has been in this business for 10 years.  He lives with his family in his in-laws' house.  His goal is to buy a plot of land and build his own home.

loans.use: Brick production

loans.name: Randy

texts.en:
Randy S. is from the village of Nailon Tudela Misamis Occidental. He is 37 years old. Randy is married with three school-aged children. To make a living, Randy owns and operates a passenger van service. Randy has had his business for over two years and earns approximately 8000 PHP a month.

In 2010, Randy joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and business. Randy has successfully repaid a previous loan from GDMPC. Randy is requesting a new loan of 12800 PHP which will be used to repair his passenger van for better service. This will be his second loan from GDMPC. He plans to use the additional revenue to improve his family's living conditions. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units of offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolk and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To repair his existing vehicle for better service

loans.name: Celsa

texts.en:
Celsa B. is from the village of Kauswagan, Aurora, Zamboanga Del Sur. She is 38 years old. Celsa is married with four school-aged children. Celsa  is a rice farmer. Celsa has had her business for over four years and earns approximately 6700 PHP a month.

In 2007, Celsa joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services for her business. Celsa has successfully repaid a previous loan of 15000 PHP from GDMPC. This previous loan was used to to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops. Celsa is requesting a new loan of 30000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. This loan will be her eighth from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue to improve her family's living conditions. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units of offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolk and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer such as manure.

loans.name: Teofila

texts.en:
