She started selling Yanbal products.  Yanbal is a company that offers enterprising women the opportunity to start making independent catalog sales.

Thanks to her good management of her working capital, Carmen is now known in her district of El Fortín de Guayaquil, a district which is noted for its dirt roads and mountains.

Every week Carmen takes orders and then delivers the products that her customers have requested.  She sells her products at low prices.  She works from 8.00am visiting her acquaintances and loyal customers so that they can buy her products.

Carmen would like to continue working, stocking her business with merchandise.  She would like to use her loan to buy perfume, creams and treatments.  In the future, she would like to have premises from which she could sell her products, stock her business with merchandise and sell clothes too.

loans.use: To buy perfume, creams and treatments

loans.name: Fatu

texts.en:
This is 46 year old Fatu K.. She is married and has one child, age 22. She has one additional dependent who lives with her because she helps in Fatu's business and around her home. 

In 1995, Fatu established her pans and rubber bowls business. Working six days a week and eight hours a day, she earns about  700000 SLL every month from this business. 

She would like a loan in the amount of 3000000 in order to add more stock to her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately 545000 SLL. 

In the future, Fatu plans to educate her child to university level. She would also like to use a portion of her profits to support her husband in building a home. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more pans and bowls

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more bags of rice

loans.name: Denis Saul

texts.es:
el sr. Denis F. tiene 34 años de edad, vive en la colonia el Carrizal de la ciudad capital, Denis se dedica al servicio de TAXI, trabaja con su automovil en el punto de Taxis del Centro Comercial Plaza MiraF., Denis esta casado y tiene hijos, su esposa se dedica a la venta de ropa para caballeros, damas y niños.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de repuestos para su automovil, su taxi tiene problemas con la direccion y con el motor y necesita hacerle el cambio lo mas pronto posible para que pueda seguir trabajando.
las ganancias las necesita para cubrir los gastos del hogar y para pagar los gastos de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Denis F. is 34 years old.  He lives in El Carrizal, in the capital city.  Denis provides a taxi service.  He works with his vehicle from the taxi stand at Plaza MiraF. Shopping Mall.  Denis is married and has children.  His wife sells men's, women's and children's clothes.

Denis will use his loan to buy spare parts for his car.  His taxi has problems with its steering and with its engine and needs to have new parts fitted as soon as possible so that he can continue working.

Denis needs the profits he makes in his job to cover his household expenses and to pay for his children's expenses.

loans.use: To buy spare parts to fix his vehicle's steering and engine problems

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Unidos Para Vencer 1, 2 Group

texts.en:
Dominica is the coordinator of her group, Unidos para Vencer 1 & 2 (Unite to Win Group). She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and three children. She enjoys doing beauty salon work, and that why she operates a salon. This is her passion.

Dominica is excited to be taking her second loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for ten years. She was starting to use her savings to buy equipment until she got her first loan. She plans to use this new loan to invest in her business by buying seven packs of hair and cosmetics products. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business and she is dreaming of  having her own "ranchito" or little house. She says that her most difficult challenges are to settle her business and get better at managing to do everything she needs to do.

Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti).  Her group is located in the urban slums surrounding Santo Domingo. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable electricity and running water (none of which is potable).

loans.use: To buy hair and cosmetics products

loans.name: Yasmina

texts.es: Yasmina tiene su negocio que es una pulpería, hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio. Inicio esta actividad ubicada en su vivienda a pesar de no ofrecer muchos productos al menos vende lo más básicos para sus clientes. Yasmina tiene 1 hijo de 6 años que le enseña cómo ganarse la vida pues ella le enseña a atender a sus clientes con el paso del tiempo ha logrado adquirir experiencia con sus diferentes clientes. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, pan, detergentes entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Yasmina owns a small grocery store.  She has had this business for more than 3 years.  She started this business, which is located in her home, in spite of the fact that she didn't have much to offer her customers except the most basic products.  Yasmina has one 6 year-old child and she teaches him how to earn a living as she teaches him how to serve the customers.  Over time, she has managed to acquire experience with her different customers.  Yasmina would like a loan to buy basic grains, candy, soft drinks, bread, detergents, etc.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Benito Rene

texts.es:
el sr. Benito F. tiene 42 años de edad, vive en colonia Smith 2 de la ciudad de Tegucigalpa, Benito presta los servicios de transportar personas, tiene un taxi y su punto de trabajo es en el centro comercial Plaza MIraF., actualmente esta pagando el vehículo a una Cooperativa.
durante el dia lleva personas que necesitan de su servicio y tambien tiene contratos permanentes por las mañanas y por las tardes para ir a dejar a personas a sus trabajos y luego a sus casas despues de la jornada de trabajo.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de llantas y amortiguadores.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Benito F. is 42 years old.  He lives in Smith 2 neighborhood, in the city of Tegucigalpa.  Benito provides transport services.  He has a taxi and he works at the Plaza MiraF. Shopping Mall.  He is currently paying a cooperative for his vehicle.

During the day Benito carries passengers who need his service and he also has permanent contracts in the mornings and afternoons, taking people to work and then taking them home again at the end of the day.

Benito will use his loan to buy tires and shock absorbers.  He needs the profits he makes from his job to get himself and his family ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy tires and shock absorbers

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Amner Ivan

texts.es:
el sr. Amner P. tiene 27 años de edad, vive en la colonia Kennedy y se dedica al servicio de Taxi, su punto es el Centro Comercial Plaza Miraflores, este centro comercial es bien visitado por muchas personas y esto hace que el negocio de taxi sea bueno en esta zona.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de repuestos para motor para mantenimiento del automovil tambien desea comprar ropa porque quiere ayudarle a su mama que tiene un negocio y quiere surtirselo para esta temporada.
texts.en:
Amner P. is 27 years old.  He lives in Kennedy neighborhood and provides a taxi service.  He works at the Plaza Miraflores Shopping Mall.  This shopping mall is very busy which means that the taxi business is very good in this district.

Amner will use his loan to buy spare parts for his vehicle's engine to keep his vehicle in order.  He would also like to buy clothes because he would like to help his mom who has a business and would like to stock it for this season.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for his engine and to buy clothes

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
el sr. Victor M. tiene 47 años de edad, vive en la colonia Kennedy y se dedica al servicio de Taxi asi mismo tiene un negocio con su esposa "RESTAUTANTE LA ARBOLEDA", que esta ubicado en la Cuarta entrada de la Colonia Kennedy, es muy visitado y puede encontrar una variedad de golosinas, almuerzos  y cenas,  está abierto de las 9:00 am hasta las 10:00pm  todos los días, su comida es fresca y deliciosa.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra materiales para la fabricacion de sus comidas.
mientras Victor todo el dia anda en su taxi transportando personas su esposa se dedica a la administracion del restaurante. juntos trabajan duro para salir adelante con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Victor M. is 47 years old.  He lives in Kennedy neighborhood and provides a taxi service.  He and his wife also have a business “Restaurante la Arboleda”, a restaurant which is located in the Fourth Entrance to the Kennedy neighborhood.  It is very popular and provides customers with a variety of sweets, lunches and suppers.  It is open from 9.00am to 10.00pm every day.  The meals are fresh and delicious.

Victor will use his loan to buy ingredients for making his meals.  While Victor works all day in his taxi, transporting passengers, his wife runs their restaurant.  Together they work hard to get themselves and their children ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks, beef, pork, chicken, tortillas, butter, oil, rice, bread, juices, condiments, margarine, disposable cups and plates, napkins, beans, cheese and vegetables

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Las Entusiastas Group

texts.es:
El presente comité se encuentra, en su 7mo ciclo. 
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Maria del Carmen P. con 32 años,  tiene 1 hijo se dedica en la venta de cosméticos. 
Ella todas las mañanas va a  hacer sus ventas  por catálogos y se translada en moto en distintas ciudades vuelve a su casa por la tarde. 
Es una señora muy sufrida que tiene un día a día muy pesado  por que al llegar de su trabajo debe de realizar las tareas de la casa y todo lo hace para salir adelante con su hijo ya que es madre soltera. 
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de cosméticos, perfumes, lencería y otros.
texts.en:
This committee is currently in its 7th loan cycle.  One of the group's members is Mrs Maria del Carmen P. who is 32 years old and has one child.  Her business is selling cosmetics.

Every morning she sells her products through catalogs and travels to different towns on her motorbike.  She returns home in the afternoon.

She is an uncomplaining woman who has a difficult daily routine because when she gets home from work she has to take care of her housework.  Everything she does is to get herself and her son ahead in life as she is a single mother.  She is requesting this loan to buy cosmetics, perfume, underwear, etc.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics, perfume, underwear, etc.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es:
el sr. Juan Bautista S. tiene 51 años de edad, vive en la colonia Henry Merriam de la ciudad de Tegucigalpa, Juan se dedica al servicio de taxi, su punto de trabajo es en el centro comercial Plaza Miraflores, Juan es propietario del vehículo y del numero, también es el Presidente de la Junta Directiva de dicho punto de taxis.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de repuestos del motor y para repuestos del sistema de frenos.
necesita reparar su automovil lo mas pronto posible para seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes y para tener buenas ganancias ya que en esta epoca muchas personas vienen a comprar a este centro comercial y necesitan de los servicios de taxis para regresar a sus casas despues de las compras.
texts.en:
Juan Bautista S. is 51 years old.  He lives in Henry Merriam neighborhood, in the city of Tegucigalpa.  Juan provides a taxi service.  He works at the Plaza Miraflores Shopping Mall.  Juan owns his own vehicle and number.  He is also the president of the board of directors of this taxi stand.

Juan will use his loan to buy spare parts for his engine and also for his brake system.  He needs to fix his car as soon as possible so that he can continue to provide a good service to his customers and so that he can make good profits since a lot of people come to shop at this mall at this time of year and they need a taxi service to take them back home after they've done their shopping.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for his engine and brake system

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es: Alejandrina, de 22 años es una joven madre de familia muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Agustín de 26 años y sus 2 queridos hijos Jairo de 3 y Estrella de 1 año, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. La actividad a la que Alejandrina se dedica es el cultivo de cacao, café y hojas de coca. Todos los días muy temprano por la mañana, comienza con el cuidado de sus chacras, ya que sabe que mientras más cuidadosa sea con sus cultivos, mejores productos obtendrá el momento de la cosecha. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y lo hace con mucha paciencia, lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus cultivos hasta la ciudad de San Francisco, que es donde vende sus productos. Con el tiempo, espera comprar más tierras, para aumentar sus cultivos. Este es primer crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas si quiere acceder a otro crédito en el futuro. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono y fertilizantes para sus cultivos, también comprará insecticidas.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is 22 years old.  She is a very kind and hard-working young mother who lives in her own home with her husband, 26 year-old Agustín, and her 2 beloved children, 3 year-old Jairo and 1 year-old Estrella.  She would like to provide them with a better quality of life.

Alejandrina's business is growing cacao, coffee and coca leaf.  Every day she gets up very early in the morning and starts looking after her farm since she knows that the more care she takes of her crops, the more produce she will obtain at harvest time.  What Alejandrina most likes about her work is sowing her land and she does this with a lot of patience.  She has been in this business for 10 years and she considers that the most difficult part of her work is transporting her crops to the city of San Francisco which is where she sells them.  Over time, she would like to buy more land so that she can grow more crops.

This is Alejandrina's first loan with MFP.  She knows that she must be punctual in making her loan repayments if she wants to have access to another loan in the future.  She will use the 2,000 Peruvian soles she is requesting to buy more manure and fertilizers for her crops.  She will also buy insecticides.

loans.use: To buy sacks of manure and fertilizers

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es: Eduardo, de 63 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Sonia de 59 años y su querido nieto Marco de 6 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. En la provincia de Ayna – San Francisco (Dentro de la selva ayacuchana), se encuentran las chacras de Eduardo, sus tierras son amplias y con los cuidados que les brinda las ha convertido en uno de los cultivos mejores trabajados del poblado, es por eso que cuando lleva a vender cacao, café y hojas de coca a la ciudad de San Francisco, obtiene muy buenos precios debido a la buena calidad de sus productos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles, lleva 45 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de la plaga que pueden afectarlos. Con el tiempo, desea comprar más tierras en otros poblados para así aumentar su producción y variar sus cultivos. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagarlo puntualmente, si quiere acceder a otro crédito en el futuro. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono y fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras.
texts.en:
Eduardo is 63 years old.  He is a very humble and hard-working man.  He lives in his own home with his wife, 59 year-old Sonia, and his beloved grandson, 6 year-old Marco.  He would like to provide them with a better quality of life.

Eduardo's plantations are located in Ayna – San Francisco province (in the Ayacuchana jungle).  His land is vast and with the care that he has given to his land, he has turned it into some of the best worked land in the area.  For this reason, when he takes his cacao, coffee and coca leaf to the city of San Francisco to sell, he obtains very good prices because of the good quality of his products.

What Eduardo most likes about his work is sowing his land and making it fertile.  He has been in this business for 45 years and he considers the most difficult part of his work being protecting his crops against insect infestations which can damage them.  Over time, he would like to acquire more land in other areas so that he can increase his production and vary his crops.

This is Eduardo's second loan with MFP.  He knows that he must make his loan repayments on time if he wants to be able to access another loan in the future.  He will use the 2,000 Peruvian soles he is requesting to buy more manure and fertilizers to improve his land.

loans.use: To buy manure and fertilizers

loans.name: Velky Dinora

texts.es:
la sra. Velky V. tiene 32 años de edad, vive en la colonia Flor del Campo y se dedica a costurar su especialidad son los Cobertores para muebles, cojines y cortinas. su taller de costura esta ubicado en su casa de habitacion, Velky cuenta con tres maquinas industriales y una sorgeteadora. su producto lo vende en Tegucigalpa y los fines de semana viaja a la ciudad de choluteca para vender su producto.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de materia prima para fabricar sus cobertores, cojines y cortinas.
con las ganancias que obtenga poder cubrir los gastos de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Velky V. is 32 years old.  She lives in Flor del Campo neighborhood and her business is sewing.  Her speciality is making furniture covers, cushions and drapes.  Her sewing workshop is located in her home.  Velky has three industrial sewing machines and an overlocking machine.  She sells her products in Tegucigalpa and on weekends she travels to the city of Choluteca to sell her products.

She will use her loan to buy raw materials for making her covers, cushions and drapes.  She will use the profits she makes to cover her children's expenses.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread, zippers, and spare parts for her sewing machines

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: Félix, de 61 años, es un hombre muy amable y humilde, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Justina de 59 años y su hijo menor Jhony de 17 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo que realiza Félix es el cultivo de cacao, café y hojas de coca, todas las mañanas junto a su esposa comienza sus días cultivando y regando sus tierras. Los ánimos que posee lo ayudan mucho en esta labor, ya que es una actividad que necesita de esfuerzo físico, pero él sabe que ningún esfuerzo esta de más con tal de brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus productos, ya que siente que los meses de trabajo lo están recompensando. Lleva 40 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus cultivos hasta la ciudad de San Francisco, que es donde vende sus productos. Con el tiempo, desea juntar el dinero necesario para comprarse nuevas tierras, con las cuales pueda incrementar su producción. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, sabe que este aporte lo ayudará mucho en el desarrollo de su trabajo. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará abono e insecticidas, ya que desea mejorar la productividad de sus tierras.
texts.en:
Félix, age 61, is a very kind and humble man.  He lives in his own house with his wife, 59 year old Justina, and his youngest child, 17 year old Jhony.  He wishes to give them a better quality of life.

Félix grows cacao, coffee, and coca leaves.  Every morning he and his wife start their days cultivating and watering their land.  The energy that they have helps them a lot in their work.  This is an activity that requires physical effort.  However, he knows that no effort is too much in order to give his family the best.

What he likes best about his work is harvesting his products.  He feels that the months of work are rewarding him.  He has been doing this work for 40 years.  The most difficult part is transporting his crops to the city of San Francisco where he sells his products.  In time he wants to get together the money he needs to buy more land.  He wants more land to be able to increase his production.

This is his first loan with MFP.  He knows that this loan will help a lot in the progress of his work.  He will use the requested 1,500 soles to buy fertilizer and insecticide.  He wants to improve the productivity of his land.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and insecticide

loans.name: Isaac

texts.es: Isaac, de 28 años, es un joven muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Analuz de 27 años y sus 4 queridos hijos, quienes son el principal motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. Trabajando arduamente Isaac ha logrado sacar adelante sus sembríos, todas las mañana se levanta muy temprano para regar y brindarle el cuidado respectivo a su cacao, café y hojas de coca, los cuales posteriormente venderá en la ciudad de San Francisco, ya que es ahí donde obtiene los mejores precios por sus productos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que puede disfrutar de la libertad de laborar en sus verdes campos. Lleva 6 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que trabajar la tierra todo el día, sin que le quede mucho tiempo para realizar otras actividades. Para más adelante, espera poder comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar su producción. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, sabe que este préstamo le ayudará bastante en el progreso y desarrollo de su negocio, es por eso que esta dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará abono y fertilizantes para mejorar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Isaac, age 28, is a very unassuming and hard-working young man.  He lives in his own house with his 27 year old wife, Analuz, and their four beloved children.  They are the main motivation for all of his efforts.  

By working arduously, Isaac has managed to get ahead with his crops.  He gets up very early every morning to water and take care of his  cacao, coffee, and coca leaf crops.  He later sells his crops in the city of San Francisco.  That is where he gets the best prices for his products.  What he likes the most about his work is being able to enjoy the freedom of working on his green fields.

He has been doing this for six years.  The most difficult part is having to work the land all day, which does not leave him much time to do his other activities.  Later he hopes to be able to buy more land in order to increase his production.

This is his first loan with MFP.  He knows that the loan will help a lot with the progress and development of his business.  That is why he is prepared to make all of his payments on time.  He will use the requested 2,000 soles to buy natural and chemical fertilizers to improve his crops.

loans.use: To buy natural and chemical fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy calves to fatten

loans.name: Eloy Guillermo

texts.es:
Eloy de 55 años,  es un hombre trabajador que por algunos problemas de la empresa donde trabajaba hace varios años atrás tuvo que salir y se quedo sin trabajo. Pero por ese inconveniente no se detuvo a esperar una oportunidad de trabajo sino que opto por invertir sus  ahorros y comprar víveres para tener una tienda. 
  
Ubico la tienda en la parte delantera de su casa y la surtió con distintos productos de primera necesidad hasta que un día tuvo un accidente se cayó de un segundo piso y se fracturo algunos huesos por eso su esposa tuvo que vender los productos de la tienda para tener dinero y pagar el tratamiento. Por la dedicación que  tenia y las fuerzas para mantener a su familia hace un año se recupero y empezó nuevamente la tienda para generar ingresos y darles un buen futuro a sus hijos. En la actualidad vive en un cantón llamado Playas uno de los lugares turísticos del Ecuador con una diversa dimensión de mariscos y trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 19h00pm todos los días. 

Para seguir trabajando y surtir más su tienda él quiere comprar con el préstamo arroz, aceite, lácteos. En el futuro quiere surtir su tienda con mercadería y construir mejor su casa.
texts.en:
Eloy, age 55, is a hardworking man. Due to some problems at the business where he used to work, he had to leave and found himself without employment. This setback didn’t stop him from hoping for an opportunity for work, and he opted to invest his savings and purchase supplies in order to have a shop.

He located the shop in the front part of his house and stocked it with basic necessities. One day, he had an accident. He fell from a second story window and fractured some bones. That’s why his wife had to sell the shop’s products in order to have money and pay for his treatment. Because of her dedication and strength in maintaining the family he recovered after one year and began the shop anew in order to generate income and give a good future to their children.

Currently he lives in a canton called Playas, one of Ecuador’s tourist areas, noted for its diverse seafood. He works from 7:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. every day. In order to continue working and to stock his store better he wants to use the loan to purchase rice, oil, and dairy products. In the future he wants to stock his store’s inventory and improve his house.

loans.use: To purchase rice, oil, and dairy products

loans.name: Karen Del Carmen

texts.es: Karen Del Carmen tiene 21 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 6 años que tiene este negocio lo inicio con esfuerzo y con mucho sacrificio. Su negocio está ubicado en punto muy estratégico en donde muchos estudiantes llegan a comprar los diferentes productos que ofrece, la mayoría de sus clientes le solicitan una gran variedad Karen tiene un gran carisma con sus clientes que diariamente llegan a su negocio. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de ropa en general, cosméticos, calzado entre otras cosas necesarias para esta época del año.
texts.en:
Karen Del Carmen, 21, has sold general merchandise for over six years that she’s had this business.  She started it with much effort and sacrifice.  It is located in a very strategic spot where many students come by to purchase the different products she has for sale.

Most of her customers ask for a great variety of things.  Karen is very charismatic with the customers that come by her business daily.

She will use the requested funds to buy assorted clothes, cosmetics and footwear, among other necessary items for this time of year.

loans.use: To buy clothing, cosmetics and footwear, among other things.

loans.name: Nuevo Esfuerzo 4, 5 Group

texts.en:
Porfiria is one of the members of this entrepreneurs group called 'Nuestro Esfuerzo' 4 & 5, 'Our effort'. She is excited to be taking out her first loan with Esperanza. She is selling jewelry and women's shoes and her plans are to use this loan to invest in bracelets, necklaces and rings and different kinds of shoes.

She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their three children. She said her most difficult challenges are to help her children to go forward, while she enjoys working and is dreaming of having a successful  and sustainable business. 

Porfiria´s story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients generally--many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti. Her group is located in Samana, a lush rugged peninsula with a nascent tourism industry, an area where crime is rampant and where none of the running water is potable and the electricity is unreliable.

loans.use: to buy jewelry and shoes

loans.name: Madres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El comité “Madres Trabajadoras ” tiene  más de 3 años de formación y trabajo con la Fundación Paraguaya, la mayoría de sus integrantes ya  realiza actividades productivas, e incluyen entre sus integrantes a 2 señoras que emprenderán actividades para generar ingresos.
 Anhelan un futuro mejor para sus hijos, es por eso que se esfuerzan el doble para facilitarles los materiales  para  su desarrollo y formación.     
Una de las integrantes es la señora  Zadi, quien se dedica a la venta de ropas y de esa forma ella obtiene su ingreso. 
Ella vende sus mercaderías en su casa y también sale a ofrecer en casas de clientes. 
Se encuentra muy contenta con su actividad y desea continuar en el comité y seguir trabajando con él para fomentar la unión entre ellas. 
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería ya que quiere contar con productos nuevos y novedosos para sus clientes, quiere comprar remeras, shorts, vestidos, blusas, zapatillas y otros.
texts.en:
The “Madres Trabajadoras” (Working Mothers) committee has been in existence and collaborating with Fundación Paraguaya for over three years.  Most of its members are already engaged in productive activities but there are two women in the group who will be starting out in income producing activities.

They strive towards a better future for their children and this is why they double their efforts to provide the tools for their development and growth.

One of the members is Zadi who sells clothes to earn income.  She sells her merchandise at home but also sells door to door.  She is very happy with her activity and wants to continue in the committee working with it to encourage unity among the members.

She is asking for the loan to buy merchandise in order to have new and original products for her customers; she wants to buy t-shirts, shorts, dresses, blouses, slippers and others.

loans.use: To buy t-shirts, dresses, shorts, slippers, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Marina

texts.es:
Rosa de 37 años, desde pequeña ella veía a la mama cuando cosía ropa y como atendía a sus clientes cogiendo las medidas del sus cuerpo para confeccionar  la ropa que ellos querían por eso ella decidió seguir la misma carrera de la mama  cosiendo y confeccionando ropa de sus vecinos obtuvo experiencia para ayudarla a la mama en su trabajo.  

Con la dedicación que utilizo para ayudarla a la mama ahora ella tiene su taller de confección y costura conjunto con ella. Trabaja  desde las 08h00am de lunes a sábado con ayuda de 5 empleadas confeccionan y cosen ropa.  Rosa quiere seguir con su negocio para poder mantener a sus hijos de 17, 7, 5 años ya que su esposo es electricista. Por eso coge turnos doble y trabaja con su mama haciendo entrega de vestidos, blusas, camisetas etc. 

Ella tiene muchas aspiración para su negocio por eso quiere comprar con el préstamo telas, hilos, accesorios para confeccionar mas ropa. En el futuro quiere incrementar el taller para poder dar trabajo a otras personas.
texts.en:
Rosa is 37 years old.  When she was a little girl, she watched her mom when she was sewing clothes and saw how she served her customers, taking their measurements so that she could make clothes that they wanted.  Rosa decided to follow the same career path as her mom, sewing and making clothes for her neighbors.  She gained experience by helping her mom in her work.

Through the same dedication with which she used to help her mom, Rosa now has a sewing and dressmaking workshop with her.  She works from 8.00am from Monday to Saturday with the help of 5 employees.  Together they make and sew clothes.  Rosa would like to continue with her business so that she can support her children aged 17, 7 and 5.  Her husband is an electrician.  Rosa works double shifts and works with her mom delivering dresses, blouses, t-shirts etc.

Rosa has a lot of aspirations for her business.  She would like to use her loan to buy fabric, threads and accessories so that she can make more clothes.  In the future, she would like to expand her workshop so that she can provide other people with work.

loans.use: To buy fabric, threads and accessories

loans.name: Yolanda Marina

texts.es: Yolanda Marina tiene 47 años, su actividad es la compra y venta de ropa nueva. Hace más de 6 años que tiene este negocio, lo inicio por la falta de ingreso que atravesaba su hogar Yolanda tiene 1 hijo de 18 años, ella siempre se esfuerza por proporcionarle lo más básicos. Su esposo le ayuda pues trabaja como odontólogo en su vivienda, la mayoría de sus clientes le visitan porque ofrece una excelente atención. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, vestidos y trajes. Sueña con incrementar su negocio.
texts.en: Yolanda Marina is 47 years old. Her business is purchasing and selling new clothes. She has had this business for more than six years; she started it because she didn't have enough income and that hurt her home. Yolanda has one son who is 18 years old. She always works to give him more than just the basics. Her husband helps her and works as a dental surgeon out of their home. Most of his patients go to him because he gives them excellent care. This loan is needed to purchase pants, shirts, skirts, dresses, and suits. Yolanda dreams of growing her business.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Maria Ofelia

texts.es: Maria Ofelia tiene 30 años, su actividad es el destace de cerdo. Hace más de 7 años que tiene este negocio ella es una mujer muy responsable que disfruta de tener este medio de vida. Ella tiene mucho de trabajar con Fundación pues no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos. Actualmente solicita este crédito para la compra de cerdos que son útiles para su negocio ya que es necesario pues se acerca una buena temporada.
texts.en: Maria Ofelia is 30 years old. Her business is butchering pigs. She's had this business for more than seven years. She is a very responsible woman who enjoys this lifestyle. She works with the Foundation a lot, so this is not the first times she has received a loan. Now she is requesting this loan to buy more pigs that are needed for her business because it is getting to be a good season.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Juana Evangelista

texts.es: Juana tiene 38 años, su actividad es la venta de comida. Hace más de 23 años que tiene este negocio. Es una mujer muy emprendedora y disfruta de este medio de vida. Tiene 7 hijos,  que los mantuvo con el gran esfuerzo de trabajo a pesar de ser una actividad muy humilde ha logrado obtener lo necesario. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de granos básicos, verduras, platos desechables, frutas para la elaboración de refrescos naturales. Espera en un futuro llegar en transformar su pequeño comedor en un restaurante.
texts.en: Juana is 38 years old; her business is selling food. She has had this business more than 23 years. She is a very enterprising woman and she enjoys this lifestyle. She has seven children who she provides for through all the work she does, despite the fact that this is very humbling, she has gotten what she needs. This loan will be used to buy basic grains, vegetables, disposable plates, and fruits for making natural beverages. She hopes in the future to transform her small dining room into a restaurant.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Felipe Nery

texts.es:
Felipe de 51 años, ha trabajado por muchos años como conserje en una escuela poco a poco ha podido reunir dinero para poder mantener su hogar. Pero por la falta de suficiente ingresos tuvo que invertir sus ahorros y comprar comida para vender por eso también tuvo que comprar una carreta porque no tenía para un local propio. 

Viviendo en una zona periurbana llamada Perimetral ha estado trabajando con su carreta durante estos años desde las 17h00pm hasta las 22h00pm vendiendo comida rápida con ayuda de su esposa. Después de llega de la escuela el comienza con ayuda de su esposa a preparar las comidas rápidas como papas con pollo o carnes, bebidas etc. 

El y su esposa quieren continuar con el negocio de comidas por eso quiere comprar con el préstamo carnes, papas, bebidas para hacer mas comida. En el futuro quiere tener un local de comidas rápidas y adecuar su negocio.
texts.en:
Felipe, 51 years old, has worked many years as a custodian at a school, and little by little has been able to gather some money for household expenses. But, because he hasn't had enough income, he had to invest some of his savings and buy food to sell, and because of this he has also had to buy a roadside stand because he didn't have his own storefront.

Living in the suburban area of Perimetral, he has been working at his stand these past years from 5 pm to 10 pm, selling fast food with his wife's help. After he gets home from the school he starts, with his wife's help, to prepare the fast food, such as potatoes with chicken or meat, beverages, etc.

He and his wife want to continue the food business, so they want to use this loan to buy meat, potatoes, and beverages to make more meals. In the future he wants to have a store for fast food and update his business.

loans.use: Meat, potatoes

loans.name: Maricela

texts.es: Maricela tienen 33 años, vive con sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Hace más de 2 años compra y vende alfalfa al por mayor, negocio que le proporciona ganancias y le demanda mucho trabajo, ya que tiene clientes que viven en su zona, lugar que queda muy lejos y les es difícil llegar a la ciudad para adquirir éste producto. Ante esto decidió vender este producto, hoy son muchos los que le solicitan alfalfa, ya que les sirve como forraje para sus animales. Sus hijos, son quienes le ayudan en el negocio, durante toda la semana, repartiendo a los clientes. En adelante anhela aumentar su capital de trabajo y así cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Es su primer crédito que tiene con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito podrá invertir en la compra de más alfalfa.
texts.en: Maricela is 33 years old; she lives with her three children in her own home. For more than two years she has bought and sold alfalfa wholesale, a business that gives her revenue and demands a lot of work because she has customers who live in her area, a place that is very far and hard to reach from the city where they could buy this product. She decided to sell this product, and now there are many people who request alfalfa because they use it to feed their animals. Her children, who are helping her with the business, make deliveries to customers all week. She wants to increase her working capital very soon so she can keep up with customer demands. This is her first loan with Kiva partner MFP; she is very happy to know that she has some financial support. She is grateful to be part of her communal bank because all the members are responsible and loyal. She is grateful to all the people who will be lenders on this loan because it will be very useful in moving her business forward. With this loan she will be able to purchase more alfalfa.

loans.use: Buy more alfalfa

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel tiene 32 años, su actividad es la venta de ladrillos hace mas de 8 años que tiene este negocio. Inicio por su familia ya que anteriormente ellos se hacían cargo del negocio y con el paso del tiempo le enseñaron a Miguel a ganarse la vida, es una persona muy trabajadora y disfruta de su actividad pues le gusta mucho elaborar este tipo de productos. Este financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de materia prima necesaria para su negocio. Sueña con ampliar su negocio cada día más.
texts.en: Miguel Ángel is 32 years old. He sells bricks and has had this business for more than eight years. He started because of his family because before, they were in charge of the business, and over time they taught Miguel how to earn a living. He is a very hardworking person and he enjoys his work, so he would really like to make this type of product. This loan that he is requesting is to purchase the basic materials necessary for his business. He dreams of growing his business day by day.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Luchando Por El Progreso 1, 2, 3 Group

texts.en:
Lucrecia is the coordinator of her group, 'Luchando por el progreso' 1, 2 & 3 (Fighting for progress). She lives in a modest home with one of her three children. She says that her most difficult challenges are to work hard and to educate her kids. In the meantime she plans to continue to enjoy sharing with friends and cooking for them.

Lucrecia is excited to be taking out her 6th loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for almost 5 years, starting with her first loan through Esperanza, which was close to $80 US. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying bottles of oil, small bags of rice, canned food, etc. She prepares small bags or packages of basic cooking ingredients like oil, rice, flour or canned goods, and sells them to her clients on credit. She collects repayments from her clients every 15 days, at which point they can buy more products on credit. She will re-invest the profits in her business. She dreams of having her own house and better conditions.

This Esperanza associate began with us because she needed to do business and her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients generally, many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti. Her group is located in the rural areas surrounding La Romana, where the sugarcane harvest and the tourist industry dominate the economy. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity that can't be counted on.

loans.use: to buy bottles of oil, small bags of rice, canned food, etc.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.es: Milagros tiene 32 años, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 10 años se dedica a la elaboración de lechón al horno, platillo que es muy delicioso y tiene mucha demanda. De esta manera, Milagros debe comprar cerdos, que son comprados para luego dedicarse a su alimentación hasta que tenga el peso exacto, ahí es cuando los sacrifica para ser cocinados y poder preparar este platillo. Una vez listo, es expendido en  las ferias comerciales, donde acude mucha gente ya que la cantidad que prepara le abastece para 100 personas. En ocasiones su cuñada y su suegra la ayudan en el negocio, así puede atender la cantidad de personas que acuden a su puesto de venta. Por tal motivo espera implementar su negocio. Es el crédito número 15 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que conoce, son  responsables y muy solidarias. Agradece  a todas las personas que serán gestoras del crédito que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más cerdos y también mandará acondicionar un horno en el interior de su casa, porque el actual esta en el patio.
texts.en: Milagros is 32 years old; she lives with her husband and their three children in their own home. For 10 years she has been making oven-roasted pig, a dish that is very delicious and in high demand. Because of this, Milagros should buy some pigs, and once they are purchased, she will feed them the right diet until they are the exact right weight. This is when she will sacrifice them to be cooked so she can prepare this dish. Once the dish is ready, it is sold in the markets where many people go, so she prepares enough for 100 people. On occasion her sister-in-law and her mother-in-law help her with the business, and this is how she is able to serve all the people who stop by her booth. Because of this she wants to (better) set up her business. This is her 15th loan with Kiva partner MFP, and she is very happy knowing that she has financial support. Also, she is grateful to be a part of her communal bank because all the members are people she knows, who are responsible and loyal. She is grateful to all the people who will be lenders on this loan she is requesting because it will be very useful for the progress of her business. With the loan that she is requesting, she will buy more pigs and also get an oven installed in her home, because right now it is on the patio.

loans.use: Buy more pigs and equip her home with an oven

loans.name: Primicia Group

texts.es:
El comité “Primicia” tiene  2 años de formación y trabajo con la Fundación Paraguaya, la mayoría de sus integrantes ya  realiza actividades productivas, pero incluyen entre sus integrantes  a  señoras que emprenderan actividades.  
Todas las señoras se encuentran muy entusiasmadas con los trabajos que vienen realizando cada una y también en grupo.
Este comité en particular es muy unido y una de las integrantes es la señora Zunilda quien se dedica actualmente  a la venta de ropas.
Ella trabaja mucho por su familia y de esa forma ayuda a su también a su marido en la manutención del hogar.
Se dedica a varias cosas a la vez, en ocasiones  prepara comestibles y vende lencerías por catálogos.
Pero actualmente está con el negocio de las ropas por la temporada que entra y solicita el préstamo para la compra de más mercaderías para venta como remeras, vestidos, shorts, y otros.
texts.en:
The Primicia committee has been around for two years and works with Kiva Partner Fundación Paraguaya. The majority of its members already have businesses, but there are also members who are learning trades.

All the women are very enthusiastic about their work, each individually, and all of them as a whole.

This committee in particular is very united and one of the members is Zunilda, who is currently selling clothes.

She works a lot to benefit her family, and in this way she also helps her husband maintain the home.

She has several businesses at a time; on occasion she will prepare meals and sell lingerie out of a catalog.

But right now she is doing this clothing business for the season, and she is requesting this loan to purchase more merchandise to sell, such as t-shirts, dresses, shorts, etc.

loans.use: Purchase clothes such as t-shirts, shorts, dresses, and other merchandise

loans.name: Rosa Victoria

texts.es:
Rosa de 42 años, para ayudar a su esposo con el ingreso de dinero ella vende productos de uso personal como cosméticos por catalogo de marca Avon (empresa que ayuda a mujeres emprendedoras a vender cosméticos a un bajo costo). 

Ella inicio con las ventas de cosméticos Avon para tener ingresos suficientes y así dales una mejor vida a sus cuatro hijos de 17, 15, 12, 11 años de edad que estudian en escuelas fiscales. Viviendo y recorriendo las calles de la Perimetral vende maquillaje, perfumes, cremas, desodorantes a un bajo costo por catalogo. Ella vende los productos a sus conocidos y vecinos.

Para incrementar su mercadería ella quiere comprar con el préstamo perfumes, maquillaje, cremas para su negocio. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa, y tener un local de los productos Avon.
texts.en:
Rosa, 42 years old, in order to help her husband with income, sells personal products such as cosmetics through the Avon catalog (a business that helps enterprising women sell cosmetics for a low cost).

She started selling Avon cosmetics in order to have enough income and so give a better life to her four children who are 17, 15, 12, and 11 years old, and who go to public school. She is living in Perimetral, going up and down the streets selling makeup, perfumes, lotions, and deodorants at a low cost through the catalog. She sells the products to her acquaintances and neighbors.

To boost her merchandise, she wants to use this loan to buy perfumes, makeup, and lotions for her business. In the future she wants to finish construction on her house and have a store for the Avon products.

loans.use: Perfumes, lotions

loans.name: Candido Humberto

texts.es:
Cándido es un pequeño comerciante, que ha logrado tener su propio negocio, gracias a su empeño y financiamiento que Afodenic ah dado mediante el financiamiento.

Su negocio es una fábrica de hacer colchón en su casa de habitación en donde lleva varios años laborando y que gracias al capital del financiamiento ha dado un giro a su negocio.
Con este préstamo lograra la compra de materia prima, dos camiones de tira, tela lisa, esponja para hacer los colchones y poder distribuir a su clientela en tiempo y forma ya que la competencia es mucha. Contento ya que su inversión se equilibra y le genera ganancia por medio de estos financiamientos.
texts.en:
Cándido is a small-businessman who has achieved owning his own business, thanks to his determination and the loan that Kiva partner Afodenic has given him through the loan process.

His business is making mattresses out of his home, out of which he has spent several years working, and thanks to the loan money, has turned around his business.

With this loan he will purchase basic materials, two truckloads of fabric strips, grey fabric, and sponge for making the mattresses so he will be able to deliver them to his customers on time since competition is fierce. He is happy since his investment is balanced and it generates revenue for him by way of these loans.

loans.use: Purchase grey cloth, sponge, and two truckloads of cloth strips so he can make more mattresses

loans.name: Huatajata Group

texts.es:
La Banca Comunal “HUATAJATA” está iniciando su primer ciclo en el Centro Focal de Germán Busch. Cuenta con ocho integrantes.  La mesa directiva está compuesta por la presidenta, la señora Alejandrina, por la tesorera, la señora Beatriz y como secretaria de actas Lidia.  Los negocios de las señoras están relacionados con el comercio, producción  y servicio, como ser: producción de mantas, producción de chamarras, confección de chamarras, tejido de mantas, repostería y costura.

La señora Alejandrina presidenta de la asociación “HUATAJATA, actualmente está casada y es madre de 8 hijos.
La señora Alejandrina,”, comenta que antes ya solicitó crédito en Pro Mujer así que ya conoce como funcionan las bancas comunales y está conciente de la importancia de la garantía solidaria.  Ahora ella necesita un capital para iniciar un nuevo negocio. La señora Alejandrina comenta que desde hace tres años aprendió a tejer mantas, sola, compró muestras y a partir de ellas fue elaborando las mantas.   El negocio que desea iniciar  la señora Alejandrina es la venta de comida, recientemente identificó un buen lugar de venta en su barrio, es una parada de buses, las personas se reúnen para subir a los buses o llegan en los buses, también los conductores son potenciales clientes. 

Cuando le consultan sobre  qué es lo que más le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde con énfasis que le gusta compartir con el  grupo.
texts.en:
The Huatajata Community Bank is beginning its first loan cycle within the Germán Busch centre. There are eight members in the group. The Board consists of Sra. Alejandrina as president, Sra. Beatriz as treasurer, and Lidia as secretary. Each of the women runs a business: for example making blankets or jackets, baking pastries, or sewing.

President Alejandrina is married and has eight children. She has already had experience with a loan from Pro Mujer so knows how community banks work. She is aware of the importance of group commitment. Alejandrina now needs a loan to start a new business. Three years ago she learned how to weave blankets by buying samples, and then copying them. However, she wants to start selling food as she recently discovered a good location in her neighbourhood. It’s at a bus stop, where people congregate to catch or get off buses. The drivers too are potential customers.

When Alejandrina is asked what she most likes about Pro Mujer, she stresses the importance of being part of a group.

loans.use: to buy wool, rice, pasta, and potatoes

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer muy dedicada al trabajo, el cual tiene que alimentar a sus tres hijos.
Hoy en día trabaja en servicios domésticos, desde hace varios años, ha sido su medio de ingresos. En donde ha logrado hacer su casa, con sus ahorros y préstamos en Afodenic. Lo que para ella ha sido de grandes beneficios estos créditos.
El objetivo de este préstamo será para hacer el repello de las paredes para lograr mejor firmeza de paredes como mejor presentación en su pequeña casa.
Los materiales a compra: arena, cemento, esponja, arena de mar para dar un mejor acabado. Lo que está contenta una vez más por un techo mas digno.
texts.en:
Ana works very hard so that she can feed her three children. She has worked as a maid for several years, and this has been her source of income. She used her savings as well as a loan from Kiva partner Afodenic to obtain her house. The loans have been a great help to her.

Ana plans to use this loan to put plaster on the walls of her small house, giving them more strength and a better appearance. She needs to buy sand, cement, a sponge, and beach sand to give a better finish. Ana will be happy to have a nicer home once again.

loans.use: to buy construction material

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
El Sr. Carlos está  casado con la Sra. Natividad, tienen 3 hijos menores que aun están en la escuela primaria.
Tienen una despensa bien surtida  donde trabaja con  Natividad.
Se iniciaron en la actividad con una platita que recibió Carlos como parte de una indemnización que había recibido Natividad en un trabajo anterior. 
Carlos  además de su despensa trabaja como guardia de seguridad en una empresa, para que de esa manera pueda ayudar a Natividad con los gastos del hogar y educar a sus hijos.
El manifiesta que la única forma de crecimiento es a través de los créditos, porque  resulta muy difícil conseguir acumular el capital operativo, razón por el cual opta por este pedido.
 El es una persona muy responsable y con ganas de superación, tiene un espíritu jovial y emprendedor que no cabe duda que va a llegar a conseguir todas las metas que se ha propuesto.
texts.en:
Sr. Carlos is married to Sra. Natividad and they have three young children who attend primary school. Together they run a well-stocked store. They started out using the money they received when laid off from previous jobs.

As well as working in the store, Carlos has a job as a company security guard. In this way he helps Natividad with household expenses and education for their children.

He maintains that the only way to get ahead is through loans as it is very difficult to accumulate capital. This is why he is seeking this loan. Carlos is a very responsible person and eager to make progress in life. He is friendly and entrepreneurial, and has no doubt that he will reach all the goals that he has set himself.

loans.use: to buy flour, rice, sugar, pasta etc

loans.name: Omar De Jesus

texts.es:
el señor Omar O. es una persona muy trabajadora y dedicada a su trabajo, se dedica a la elaboracion de artesanias de madera, distribuye su producto a tiendas y suvenirs de San Pedro Sula, Tegucigalpa y Choluteca, tambien vende a comerciantes individuales, Omar tiene su taller en su casa de habitacion, trabaja muy 
fuerte para sacar adelante a su familia. Omar trabaja de lunes sabado y se levanta a las 4 de la mañana para terminar los pedidos que le hacen cada semana.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar los materiales para la elaboracion de sus artesanias.
ya que es epoca de navidad muchos turistas ingresan a nuestro pais y ellos son los clientes mas fuertes que hay.
texts.en:
Omar O. is a very hard-working person who is committed to his work.  He makes handicrafts from wood and distributes his products to stores and souvenir places in San Pedro Sula, Tegucigalpa and Choluteca.  He also sells to individual salespeople.

Omar's workshop is in his home.  He works very hard to get his family ahead.  Omar works from Monday to Saturday.  He gets up at 4 o'clock in the morning to finish the orders that he has every week.  He will use his loan to buy materials that he needs to make his handicrafts since a lot of tourists come to our country during the Christmas period and they are the most important customers that there are.

loans.use: To buy wood, adhesive, sealant, sandpaper, oil, screws, nuts, nails and tacks

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
Josefa es una mujer trabajadora, madre de cinco hijos, su negocio es la venta de tortillas y venta de cereales.
Pues ha sido su medio de lograr ingresos para dar la alimentación  a sus hijos. Lo cual vende todos los días en su casa de habitación. Es una mujer de recursos económicos muy pobre, pero se esfuerza por lograr mejoras a su casa también. Con este préstamo comprara materia prima como: maíz, cacao, semilla de jícaro, canela, clavo de olor y leña para hacer el cereal y palmear sus tortillas lo que espera vender mas.
texts.en: Josefa is a hard-working woman who has five children.  Her business is selling tortillas and cereal.  This is her way of earning income so that she can feed her children.  She sells her products from her home every day.  She is a woman of few economic means but she works hard to make improvements to her house as well.  She will use this loan to buy ingredients such as: corn, cacao, jícaro seeds (jícaro is a fruit native to Mexico and Central America), cinnamon, cloves and firewood for making her cereal and hand making her tortillas which she hopes to sell more of.

loans.use: To buy corn, cacao, cinnamon, cloves and firewood for making cereal and a larger quantity of tortillas

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
El Sr. Gustavo  es  casado con la Sra. Blanca , tienen 2 hijos menores.
Tienen una despensa bien surtida  donde trabaja con  Blanca.
Se iniciaron en la actividad con unos ahorros que tenían guardados, fueron juntando con mucho sacrificio.  
Gustavo además de su despensa trabaja como transporte alternativo en su furgón. 
Ella manifiesta que la única forma de crecimiento hoy en día es a través de los créditos, porque resulta muy difícil conseguir acumular el capital operativo para llevar adelante una inversión, razón por el cual opta por el crédito. 
Confiamos que Gustavo utilizara su dinero para invertir en su progreso y en el de su familia.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de azúcar, harina, fideos, arroz, y otros.
texts.en:
Gustavo is married to Blanca.  They have 2 dependent children.  They have a well-stocked grocery store where they both work.  They started out in this business with some savings which they scraped together with a lot of hard work.

As well as running his grocery store, Gustavo also works provides transportation with his van.  He says that the only way to grow these days is through loans because it is very difficult to get together enough working capital to move ahead with an investment.  This is why he is requesting this loan.

We believe that Gustavo will use his money to invest in his progress and that of his family.  He is requesting his loan to buy sugar, flour, noodles, rice, etc.

loans.use: To buy flour, oil, rice, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Luisa Eloysaa

texts.es: Luisa Eloysa tiene 57 años, su actividad es una pulpería. Hace más de 32 años que tenia este negocio es una persona muy humilde que siempre está pendiente de lo que sus clientes le solicitan. Inicio este medio de vida porque no tenía un trabajo que le proporcionara los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamiento en Fundación por lo que se siente muy agradecida con tal de mejorar su negocio. El motivo del crédito es para la compra materia prima ya que se acerca una buena temporada.
texts.en:
Luisa Eloysa, 57, has a grocery store.  She has had the business for over 32 years.  She is a very humble person who is always on the look out for what her customers request.

She started this business because she did not have work that provided income needed for her home.  She is a very hard working person and this is not her first loan request with the Fundación; she is very grateful to be able to improve her business.

The reason for the loan is to buy merchandise because a very good season is approaching.

loans.use: To buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Norlan Jose

texts.es:
Norlan es un padre de familia  muy dedicado, casado, siendo su oficio cadete de taxi,  la unidad es propia el cual adquirió con ahorros a mucho esfuerzo. Atreves de los préstamo logra dar mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que es su medio de ingreso.
Entre las dificultades es la gasolina que esta ah altos costos y queda pocas ganancias. Su objetivo es dar mantenimiento de sistema de suspensión y dirección del taxi.
Todo esto lo hace atreves de los financiamiento que Afodenic da. Lo que es de gran ayuda para lograr un mejor servicio de carrera para los clientes y que es un gasto que paga  a plazos.
texts.en:
Norlan is a very dedicated father.  He’s married and works as a taxi driver.  He owns his vehicle which he bought with his own savings and much effort.  Thanks to the loans he is able to service the vehicle since it’s his source of income.

Among the difficulties is that gasoline prices are very high so profits are low.  His goal is to service the suspension and steering systems of the taxi.

He does all this through Afodenic loans which are of great use to him in being able to provide his customers with a better transportation service and because he is able to repay in installments.

loans.use: For vehicle maintenance and repair.

loans.name: Alcira

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PRIMAVERA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Alcira; ella tiene 29 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en la fiscalía, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 3:00 p.m, la socia quiere seguir estudiando y mejorar en su trabajo y también le gustaría tener una tienda para vender la ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para uso personal como para comprarse ropa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Alcira, 29, is a member of the ‘PRIMAVERA” (Spring) communal bank located in Cusco district which is part of Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is single.  She alternates her daily chores with employment in the district attorney’s office.  She works from 8am until 3pm.  She wants to continue to study and improve in her work but she’d also like to have a store to sell clothes.  She is asking for the loan for personal use: to buy clothes for herself.

She is happy for the loan and commits to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: For personal use: buying clothes.

loans.name: Duo Solidario Genesareth Group

texts.es:
G.S. GENEZARETH

FLORIDALMA P. U.. tiene 36 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de paca, desde hace dos años, ella dice que quiere su credito para poder comprar otra paca porque hay mucha gente que en esta epoca no tiene dinero para comprar ropa nueva, y es por esa razon que compra ropa usada.

SILVIA AZUCENA P. U.
tiene 32 años de edad tiene 4 hijos, ella vive sola con sus hijos se dedica a la venta de refacciones por las tardes y al mesdio dia vende tortillas en su casa, ella dice que su credito lo necesita para poder  Comprar más productos para elavorar comida y vender mas comidas elavoradas. en su tortilleria, y asi tener más clientes.
texts.en:
Genezareth Solidarity Group

Floridalma P. U. is 36 years old.  She has been selling bundles of clothes for two years.  She says that she would like a loan so that she can buy another bundle because there are a lot of people at this time who don't have money to buy new clothes.  For that reason, they buy used clothing.

Silvia Azucena P. U. is 32 years old.  She has 4 children and lives alone with her children.  She sells spare parts in the afternoons and at midday she sells tortillas from her home.  She says that she needs this loan so that she can buy more products for making meals and selling more prepared meals in her tortilla bakery so that she can attract more customers.

loans.use: To buy used clothes and to buy ingredients for preparing meals

loans.name: Amalia

texts.es:
La Sra. Amalia   está  casada,  tiene una pequeña Panadería  en el km 7_ Villa Fanny ,  el trabajo de la  misma es gratificante, ya que cuenta con una considerable cantidad de cliente, y el ingreso es bastante satisfactorio.

Con la ayuda de su esposo  están  saliendo adelante con voluntad, trabajo y dedicación.
Hoy día se ha convertido en una microempresaria exitosa y en constante progreso.
Es muy cumplidora con sus compromisos por lo que merece el debido apoyo para seguir creciendo.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de materia prima para la panadería especial para harina de trigo.
texts.en:
Amalia is married and has a small bakery at Km. 7, Villa Fanny.  Her work is very gratifying because she has quite a few customers and income is quite satisfactory.

With her husband’s help they are getting ahead with will, work and dedication.  Today, she has become a successful micro businesswoman who is constantly making progress.

She is very committed to her responsibilities so deserves the proper support to continue growing.

She is asking for funds to buy raw materials for the bakery, especially wheat flour.

loans.use: To buy flour.

loans.name: Gardenia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PRIMAVERA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gardenia; ella tiene 26 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de productos agroindustriales, la socia vende chocolates y cafes, ella es propietaria de una planta que distribuye estos productos en la ciudad de Quillabamba, ella quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de chocolates y cafes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para producir el chocalate y café.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “PRIMAVERA”. The bank is located in the district of Cuzco, belonging to the province and department of Cuzco. 

The member is Gardenia. She is 26 years old and single. She alternates her activities between her daily activities and the business of agro-industrial products.  She sells chocolates and coffee and is the owner of a plant that distributes these products in the city of Quillabamba. She wants to expand the business of selling chocolates and coffee. She is asking for the loan to buy materials to produce the chocolate and the coffee.  

The member is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: The member is asking for the loan to buy materials to produce chocolate and coffee.

loans.name: Barsilisa

texts.es:
Barsilisa es una Sra. joven, viuda vive sola en el barrio remancito, no tiene hijos.
         Ella tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de ropas en su casa, además a la mañana trabaja en el poder judicial para aumentar sus ingresos.
       Ella compra las ropas de Argentina y el Brasil viajando semanalmente a esos destinos. 
          Ella se inicio con  un dinero que junto con otros trabajos anteriores, mes a mes va aumentando su negocio con el salario que recibe en el otro trabajo.
              Ella es una persona muy responsable y con ganas de superación, tiene un espíritu jovial y emprendedor que no cabe duda que va a llegar a conseguir todas las metas que se ha propuesto.
texts.en:
Barsilisa is a young, widowed woman. She lives alone in the Remancito neighborhood. She has no children.  

She has a small business selling clothes in her home.  She also works mornings at the judicial branch in order to increase her income.  She buys the clothes from Argentina and Brazil, traveling weekly to those destinations. 

She started with money she saved from previous jobs, growing her business month to month  with the salary she receives from her other business. 
      
She is a very responsible person who wants to get ahead. She has a jovial and enterprising spirit and there is no doubt that she will reach  
all of the goals she has set for herself.

loans.use: To buy t-shirts, flip-flops, shorts, dresses and more.

loans.name: Maximina Esperanza

texts.es:
Maximina de 55 años, decidió ser comerciante informal para poder ayudar a su esposo con la carga familiar que ha tenido ya que él era el único que mantenía el hogar. Viviendo en una zona periurbana llamada Perimetral ella ha sido conocida por distintas personas como comerciante de arroz.

Su trabajo lo ha venido realizando comprando en un cantón llamado “Daule” ya que en ese lugar la mayoría de los agricultores venden sus sembríos a los comerciantes. Cada saco de arroz los comprar a $ 30.00 y si los comprar al por mayor los comprar a $ 25.00. 

Para seguir con su comercialización ella quiere comprar con el préstamo arroz y dedicar la mayor parte del dinero a readecuar su casa porque ya se acerca la temporadas de lluvias comprando cemento, bloques. En el futuro quiere comprar una camioneta para tener más movilidad en sus ventas.
texts.en:
Maximina, 55 years old, decided to be an informal merchant, to be able to help her husband with the responsibility for the family that he bore as the only earner in the family. She lives in Perimetral, on the city's edge, and has long been known by distinct persons as a rice merchant.

Maximina carries out her work by buying rice in Daule canton, where the majority of farmers sell their harvests directly to merchants. She buys each sack of rice for $30, or at $25 wholesale.

To promote sales, she wants to use  part of the loan to buy rice, then the majority to upgrade her home, since the rainy season is approaching.  She will buy cement and blocks. In the future, Maximina wants to purchase a van so she can have sales mobility.

loans.use: TO BUY CEMENT AND BLOCKS FOR HOME REPAIRS, AND RICE TO SELL

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es:
María es una mujer muy esforzada para apoyar a su familia y lograr el pan de cada día ya que es una mujer sola.
Su negocio es una pulpería que administra desde hace diez años, el cual inicio con poco, siendo Afodenic de gran apoyo mediante sus crédito en donde sus niveles de venta aumentaron al ofrecer más variedad en sus mercaderías con precios más competitivos. Ya que compra en un mercado de la capital a buen precio.
Con este nuevo financiamiento podrá invertir en productos de consumos como: carnes, pollo, lácteos, golosinas, gaseosas, productos de limpieza entre otros productos que generen mejor ganancias.
texts.en:
María works hard to suport her family and feed them every day, because she is a single woman. She has owned a grocery store for the last ten years. She started with little and Afodenic loans helped her a great deal. When sales increased she was able to offer a greater variety of goods at more competitive prices, because she would buy products at a good price at the market in the capital city. 

She will invest the new loan in the purchase of consumer products such as meat, poultry, dairy, sweets, soft drinks, cleaning products and other goods that generate better profits.

loans.use: She will buy consumer producs such as poultry, meat, dairy products, cleaning products and other goods to sell more.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La Señora Celia Isabel es cliente recurrente de la Función Paraguaya apartir del año 2009, está acompañada con señor Merardo Paredes y son padres de dos hijos, están domiciliados en el Barrio Santa Inés,  de la Ciudad de Presidente Franco.
Es de profesión comerciante, posee una despensa en su domicilio, en un conjunto de casa donde realiza la venta de varios artículos de primera necesidad, limpieza etc.
Actualmente solo está operando financieramente con nuestra Institución, siempre demostró un impecable comportamiento de pago con las obligaciones asumidas.
Son personas trabajadoras, honestas y con una visión de emprendedurismo.
Solicitan el préstamo para la compra de mercaderías para su despensa como azúcar, harina, fideos, arroz, aceite, verduras, frutas y otros.
texts.en:
Señora Celia Isabel has been a repeat client at Función Paraguaya since 2009. She works with her partner, Merardo Paredes; they are parents of two children. They live in the Santa Inés neighborhood of the city of Presidente Franco.

Her profession is commerce. She has a store in her home, in a part of her house where she sells various basic necessities, cleaning products, etc.

Now she gets her financing only from our institution. She has always shown impeccable behavior in making her payments for the obligations she has assumed.

They are hardworking, honest people with an entrepreneurial vision.

They are applying for this loan to buy merchandise such as sugar, flour, pasta, rice, oil, fruits and vegetables, and other items for their store.

loans.use: Buy merchandise for her store, such as sugar, flour, pasta, rice, oil, fruits and vegetables, and other items.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
La señora Rosa Maria C. tiene 47 años de edad, vive en la aldea las Piletas de la ciudad de Choluteca y se dedica al comercio, vende mercaderia como ser: pantalones, camisas, camisetas, blusas, faldas etc. su mercaderia la vende en la aldea en donde vive, ademas cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo y de su hijo en las ventas de su mercaderia.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa nueva al por mayor ya que para esta epoca de navidad tiene muchos pedidos de sus clientes.
su meta es seguir creciendo en su negocio y de esta manera tener una mejor calidad de vida tanto para ella como para su familia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Rosa Maria C. is 47, and she lives in the village of Las Piletas in the city of Choluteca and she is in sales.  She sells items such as: pants, shirts, blouses, t-shirts, skirts, etc.  She does most of her business in the area where she lives and she has help from her husband and son.

She will use the loan to buy new clothing wholesale since it is Christmas season and she has many orders from her customers.

Her goal is have her business continue growing and thus have a better quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: To buy shoes, sandals, pants, shirts, t-shirts, blouses, skirts, bathing suits and backpacks

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es: Rocío tiene 40 años  vive con su esposo y sus 4 hijos en su  casa propia. Desde hace 10 años se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales menores, actividades que lo desarrollan los fines de semana. En tanto los días de semana se dedica a cuidar de su cultivo, principalmente de la alfalfa y el maíz, éste último lo deja secar al sol y luego venderla en la feria local de su zona, en tanto la alfalfa lo vende por las mañanas. Es así que todos sus esfuerzos hacen que genere capital que necesita para el sustento de económico de su familia. El sueño de Rocío es tener una granja grande de animales menores y producir mayores  extensiones de terreno en alfalfa y maíz. Es el crédito número 7 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más animales.
texts.en:
Rocio is 40 years old and lives with her husband and their 4 children in her own house.  Some 10 years ago, she took up agriculture and raising farm animals, activities she pursues on weekends. Meanwhile, on weekdays, Rocio cares for her crops, principally alfalfa and corn. The latter she leaves to dry in the sun and, later sells in the local regional fair. Mornings he also sells alfalfa.

Thus, all her efforts are directed to generating the capital she needs to sustain her family economically. Rocio's dream is to have a large farm in order to raise more animals and produce larger extensions of land in alfalfa and corn.

This is Rocio's 7th loan with MFP, and she is very content knowing that she can obtain financial help. In addition, Rocio appreciates being a part of a communal bank because all the people involved are responsible and committed.  Rocio  is grateful to all those who support her loan, which will be very useful in advancing her business.  With this loan, she will invest in the purchase of more animals.

loans.use: TO BUY MORE FARM ANIMALS TO RAISE

loans.name: Imelda

texts.es: Imelda tiene 75 años su negocio es la venta de ropa usada. Hace más de 4 años que se dedica a este negocio. Ella inicio por una vecina quien le ayuda a sacar adelante a su familia. Es una persona que no es la primera vez que ha trabajado en Fundación. El motivo de este crédito es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, ropa variada para esta época del año.  El sueña con sobrevivir con su negocio que es su única forma de vida.
texts.en: Imelda is 75 years old and her business is selling used clothes.  She has been doing this for more than 4 years.  She started because a neighbor wanted to help her improve life for her family.  This is not the first time that she has worked with the Foundation.  The purpose of this loan is to buy pants, shirts, skirts, and other various clothing items for this season.  She dreams of surviving with this business, which is her only form of income.

loans.use: Business Capital

loans.name: Erika Vanessa

texts.es: La señora Erika es cliente antiguo trabaja a la misma vez con el grupo solidario portada desde el año 2007, durante todo este tiempo ha demostrado ser una persona responsable ya que todos sus pagos fueron de forma puntual.  Doña Erika es soltera, su actividad es la venta de ropa, ella vende Chompas y sacones, aparte de su actividad estudia enfermería ya que tiene ganas de superarse para así poder ayudar a sus hermanos menores que están en etapa escolar.  Vive en la casa de sus abuelos junto a sus hermanos menores. El crédito será destinado en la compra de chompas y sacones par su venta en fiestas de fin de año, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Erika is a long-time client who works at this time with the Grupo Solidario Portado.
