Este crédito es para comprar zapatos, y productos naturales, sus sueños son seguir trabajando y algún dia poder viajar a los Estados Unidos a visitar a unos hermanos que viven allá.
texts.en:
Every fortnight the members of the 'La California' community bank meet in the Nueva California district of the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí, which has been known for many years as the city of the royal tamarind trees.

Eliana has been a member of her community bank for 10 years and she is very happy with the benefits that she has received from the institution.  She is 58 years old and separated but has three children from her relationship.  They are all now grown up.  Two of her children are professionals and the other is studying at university.

Eliana is a teacher in a local public school.  She also sells shoes and natural products.  She works every day in the afternoons and evenings and she makes her sales door to door.  She leaves her products on credit and collects payment every week.  She buys her products in Quito and Guayaquil twice a month.

This loan will be used to buy shoes and natural products.  Eliana's dreams are to continue working and one day to be able to travel to the USA so that she can visit some of her siblings who live there.

loans.use: To buy shoes and natural products

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel es un padre de familia de 44 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y sus dos menores hijos en el sector Capote del distrito de Picsi, ubicado a 20 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

La necesidad de salir adelante a pesar de las limitaciones económicas de su familia, le llevó a trabajar como obrero de construcción hace 20 años. Durante todo este tiempo esta actividad ha sido su principal fuente de sustento y le ha ayudado a sacar adelante a su familia. Poco a poco se ha ido haciendo conocido en el medio y ahora su trabajo es valorado por la responsabilidad y eficacia con la que es realizado.

Debido a la alta demanda en la zona ha instalado también un negocio de elaboración de adobes y ladrillos el cual le está ayudando a agenciarse de ingresos adicionales. Actualmente el desea adquirir material para ampliar su negocio y así aumentar sus ventas, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.

Miguel ya ha tenido un crédito anterior financiado por el fondo Kiva a través de Edpyme Alternativa y su producto Capital Semilla. En aquella oportunidad pudo adquirir herramientas para poder mejorar sus trabajos como obrero constructor. Por ello el se encuentra agradecido con las personas que le apoyaron.
texts.en:
Miguel is a 44 year-old father who lives with his wife and two dependent children in Capote sector of Picsi district, 20 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

The need to get ahead in spite of his family's financial limitations, led Miguel to start work as a builder 20 years ago.  For the last 20 years, this has been Miguel's main source of support and it has helped him to get his family ahead in life.  He has gradually become known in the trade and now his work is valued for the responsibility and efficiency with which it is carried out.

Owing to the high demand in his area, he also set up a business making unbaked bricks and regular bricks.  This is helping him to make additional income.  Currently he would like to buy material to expand his business and thereby improve his sales.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Miguel has already had a Kiva loan through Edpyme Alternativa and our seed money product.  He used that money to acquire tools to improve his work as a builder.  He is very grateful to the people who supported him.

loans.use: To buy material to expand his business making and selling unbaked bricks and regular bricks

loans.name: Jorge Simón

texts.es:
Jorge tiene 44 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su familia en el distrito de Chepén, una zona agrícola de bastante movimiento comercial que se encuentra ubicada en la región La Libertad, a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica desde hace cinco años a la venta de menestras y alimentos en un puesto ambulante situado en el mercado de la zona, actualmente también ofrece en venta carne horneada de pavo y gallina por las tardes. Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad le sirven para solventar la economía de su familia y sacarla adelante.

Jorge desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más mercadería para ampliar sus ventas, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles que piensa invertir en la compra de más menestras y carne de aves.
texts.en:
Jorge is 44 years old.  He is married and lives with his family in Chepén district, an agricultural area with quite a lot of commercial activity which is located in La Libertad region, more than one hour from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

For five years Jorge has been selling legumes and food from a street stall in the area's market.  He currently also offers baked turkey and chicken meat in the afternoons.  The income that he makes from this activity helps him to support his family financially and get them ahead in life.

Jorge would like to expand his business buy acquiring more merchandise so that he can increase his sales.  For this reason he is requesting a loan for 1,200 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which he is planning to invest in buying more vegetables and poultry.

loans.use: To buy legumes and poultry to expand his sales business in the market

loans.name: María Orfilia

texts.es:
En la ciudadela nueva california de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal La California.
 
Aquí encontramos a la señora María, ella tiene 47 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación  tiene seis hijos,  4 de ellos ya son mayores de edad y las últimas son dos niñas de 13 y 10 años que estudian en colegio y escuela. Tres de sus hijos viven con ella.  Su marido es maestro zapatero.

Tienen junto a su esposo un taller de zapatería en el cual arreglan, elaboran y venden calzado de todo tipo, trabajan de lunes a sábado desde las 8 am hasta las 18h00. Los zapatos elaborados los compran en Guayaquil y lo que es materia prima la compran en Quito, nos cuenta que lleva en su taller por 13 años y que siempre le ha ido bien.

Este crédito es para comprar zapatos elaborados y materia prima para la fabricación de los mismos. Este es el tercer ciclo en el Banco Comunal. Su sueño es tener un local  separado del taller para vender los zapatos.
texts.en:
Every fortnight the members of the 'La California' community bank meet in the Nueva California district of the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí, which has been known for many years as the city of the royal tamarind trees.

Here we meet 47 year-old María.  She is married and has six children from this relationship.  Four of her children are already grown up and her two youngest are girls aged 13 and 10 who are in school.  Three of her children live with her.  Her husband is a master shoemaker.  

María and her husband have a shoemaking workshop in which they mend, make and sell all kinds of footwear.  They work from Monday to Saturday, from 8.00am to 6.00pm.  They buy their pre-made shoes in Guayaquil and buy their raw material in Quito.  María tells us that she has had her workshop for 13 years and it has always done well.

This loan will be used to buy pre-made shoes and raw materials for making shoes.  This is María's third loan cycle with her community bank.  Her dream is to have premises separate from her workshop where she can sell the shoes they make.

loans.use: To buy raw materials and shoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy supplies to expand her business selling meals

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
Susana tiene 25 años de edad, es casada y reside junto a sus padres en el caserío Cruz del Médano del distrito de Mórrope, una zona agrícola poblada principalmente por personas humildes y trabajadoras. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Lambayeque.

Ella trabaja confeccionando prendas de vestir, las cuales son solicitadas por un comerciante que suele visitar la zona en donde vive realizando pedidos y recogiendo la mercadería una vez que esté lista. El negocio demanda mucha creatividad y paciencia y ella los realiza con mucho gusto, para realizarlo tiene un pequeño taller en su domicilio. Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales. Los ingresos que percibe de estas actividades los utiliza para solventar sus gastos personales y ayudar a su familia a salir adelante.

Susana desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más materiales como hilos y telas para poder cumplir con algunos pedidos pendientes, asimismo desea adquirir alimento balanceado para ampliar su negocio de crianza y venta de animales. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Susana is 25 years old.  She is married and lives with her parents in the village of Cruz del Médano, in Mórrope district, an agricultural area whose residents are mainly modest and hard-working people.  The area is located in Lambayeque province.

Susana makes clothes which are requested by a salesman who usually visits the area where she lives making orders and collect the merchandise once it is ready.  Her business requires a lot of creativity and patience and she enjoys her work a lot.  She has a small workshop in her home.  Susana also raises and sells animals.  She uses the profits that she makes from these activities to cover her personal expenses and help her family to get ahead.

Susana would like to expand her business, acquiring more materials such as thread and fabric so that she can fill some pending orders.  She would also like to acquire balanced animal feed to expand her business raising and selling animals.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To buy materials to expand her dressmaking business

loans.name: Idalba Poderosa

texts.es:
En la ciudadela nueva california de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal La California.
 
En este lugar encontramos y conocimos a la señora Idalba, tiene 49 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tiene una hija de 9 años que estudia en la escuela. Su marido es comerciante. Lleva varios años en  el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y le ayudan mucho en su negocio.
 
Ella tiene una tienda de víveres de consumo, vende además algunos remedios, bisutería y cosas de bazar ya que esto le da ganancias extra comenta, trabaja todos los días desde las 7am hasta las 19h00, dice que tiene muchos clientes porque en su tienda se encuentra de todo desde carne, queso, embutidos pescado, etc. trabaja con la ayuda de su esposo. Dice que ya son 15  años que esta en este negocio y le ha ido muy bien. Su mercadería la compra en Portoviejo, y también le entregan en su local.

Este crédito lo va emplear en surtir más su tienda con sus productos como: arroz, azúcar, detergentes, aceites, enlatados, etc. Su meta es agrandar aun más su negocio.
texts.en:
Every fortnight the members of the 'La California' community bank meet in the Nueva California district of the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí, which has been known for many years as the city of the royal tamarind trees.

Here we meet and get to know 49 year-old Idalba.  Idalba is married and has a 9 year-old daughter who is in school.  Her husband is a salesman.  Idalba has been a member of her community bank for several years and she likes it because the loans are dispensed quickly and they help her a lot in her business.

Idalba has a general store where she also sells some medicines, costume jewelry and a variety of other items since this provides her with more income.  She works every day from 7.00am to 7.00pm.  She says that she has a lot of customers because they can find everything they want in her store: meat, cheese, deli meats, fish, etc.  Idalba works with the help of her husband.  She says that she has had this business for 15 years and it has done very well.  She buys some of her merchandise in Portoviejo and some is delivered direct to her premises.

Idalba will use this loan to better stock her store with more products such as: rice, sugar, detergents, oil, canned goods, etc.  Her goal is to expand her business even more.

loans.use: To buy rice, meat, sugar, detergents, oil, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa es una madre D. familia D. 53 años D. edad que resiD. junto a su esposo y a su familia en el caserío Punto 9 del distrito D. Lambayeque, una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada a media hora D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la preparación y venta chicha D. jora (una bebida típica del país que se prepara desD. épocas remotas en base a un tipo especial D. harina D. maíz), ella prepara la bebida en su domicilio y la ofrece en venta a los vecinos D. la zona. El negocio tiene buena acogida debido a que  la chicha es bastante consumida en la zona, sobretodo en diversas celebraciones y festividades. Además los trabajadores D. su localidad tienen por costumbre consumir chicha antes D. iniciar sus actividades ya que creen que la bebida les ofrece energía y vigor. 

Rosa también se dedica a la crianza y venta D. animales, con los ingresos que percibe, ella se encarga D. sacar adelante la economía D. su familia. Su esposo se dedica a trabajar como jornalero en los campos D. cultivo D. la zona.

Rosa desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más insumos para seguir preparando chicha, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 500 nuevos soles que le permitan lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Rosa is 53 year old mother who lives with her husband and family in the Punto 9 town in the Lambayeque district. This is a rural area that is about a half hour from the city of Chiclayo.

She makes a living making and selling "chich D. jora" which is a typical beverage prepared for ages in the country, based on a special type of corn flour. She makes the beverage in her home and sells it to he neighbors. The business is successful since chicha is consumed quite a lot in the area especially during celebrations and festivities. Additionally workers in the area tend to consume the beverage before work since the believe the beverage lends them energy and vigor. 

Rosa also raises and sells animals. She uses the income to help the family get ahead. Her husband is a day worker on the local farms. Rosa hopes to expand her business by purchases items to make chicha. That is why she has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 500 Nuevos Soles that will help her meet her goals.

loans.use: Purchase items needed to expand her business preparing and selling "chicha de jora"

loans.name: Teófilo

texts.es:
Teófilo es un padre de familia de 50 años de edad que reside junto a su familia en el caserío Bodegones del distrito de San José, una zona perteneciente a la provincia de Lambayeque. Se encuentra ubicado por lo menos a media hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a trabajar en actividades agrícolas desde que era bastante joven. Empezó trabajando como peón agrícola y luego pudo ahorrar dinero para poder obtener sus propios ingresos como agricultor. El suele sembrar diversos granos y cereales como arroz y maíz. Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad le sirven para sacar adelante a su familia y brindarles una mejor calidad de vida.

Teófilo necesita preparar su terreno para instalar un nuevo cultivo de arroz y poder trabajar durante esta campaña, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Teofilo is a 50 year old father who lives with his family in the town of Bodegones in the San Jose district which is in the province of Lambayeque. It is about a half hour from the city of Chiclayo. 

He has made a living in agriculture since he was quite young. He began working as a farm hand and was able to save enough money to make money as a farmer on his own. He plants various grains such as rice and corn. The money he makes helps him get his family ahead and  offer them a better quality of life. 

Teofilo needs to prepare his land for a new crop of rice and so be able to work this season. That is why he has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1500 Nuevos Soles that will help him meet his goal.

loans.use: Prepare land for rice production

loans.name: Evely Dolores

texts.es:
En la ciudadela nueva california de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal La California.
 
Hace dos años la señora Evely es socia del Banco Comunal y le ha gustado porque gracias a la Fundación Espoir ha logrado salir adelante en su negocio y en su vida personal. Tiene 27 años,  está casada y fruto de esta relación tiene 2 hijos de 7 y 2 años que son el amor de su vida, la mayor esta en el tercer año de educación  básica. Su esposo es mecánico y taxista.

Es una muy buena ama de casa que además se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo, bisutería y productos Avon (cosméticos, productos de belleza, perfumería y accesorios para damas) trabaja los viernes, sábados y domingos desde las 7am hasta las 12pm, aunque sus clientes también llegan hasta su casa y les vende a cualquier hora. Compra la mercadería en Guayaquil ya que allá consigue a buen precio y mayor variedad.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar más mercadería como ropa, bisutería y productos Avon.  Su sueño es tener su casa propia ya que donde vive es alquilado.
texts.en:
The members of the La California Communal Bank meet every two weeks in the Nueva California area in the city of Portoviejo.  It is the capital of Manabí, which has been known for many years as the city of the royal tamarind trees.

Evely has been a member of the communal bank for two years.  She has liked it because, thanks to the Fundación Espoir, she has managed to get ahead in her business and in her personal life.  She is married and has two children.  The children are 7 years old and two years old, and they are the love of her life.  The oldest one is in the third year of elementary school.  Her husband is a mechanic and a taxi driver.

She is a very good housewife who also sells all types of clothes, costume jewelry, and Avon products (cosmetics, beauty products, perfume, and women’s accessories).  She works on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday from 7:00 a.m. until 12:00 p.m.  However, her customers also go to her house, and she sells to them at all hours.

She buys the merchandise in Guayaquil because she gets a good price and greater variety there.

She will use this loan to buy more merchandise like clothes, costume jewelry, and Avon products.  Her dream is to have her own house because she now rents where she lives.

loans.use: To buy costume jewelry, clothes, and Avon products

loans.name: Jesús

texts.es:
Jesús es soltero, tiene 21 años de edad y reside junto a su familia en una zona urbano – marginal del distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz, uno de los distritos más poblados y comerciales de la región Lambayeque, concentra bastante movimiento de transporte y en el se encuentra ubicado el mercado mayorista de la región (Mercado Moshoqueque). Su población se encuentra concentrada en su mayoría en zonas marginales.

Jesús se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de carga y pasajeros en una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado consistente en una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina para brindar servicio de transporte). Usualmente brinda su servicio por las principales calles de su distrito y con los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad suele solventar sus gastos personales y ayudar a su familia a salir adelante.

El excesivo uso brindado a su unidad móvil ha hecho que esta empiece a sufrir algunas fallas que requieren de urgente reparación para garantizar su correcto funcionamiento. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 700 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Jesús is 21 years old and single.  He lives with his family in a marginally urbanized zone in the José Leonardo Ortiz district.  It is one of the most populated and commercialized districts in the Lambayeque region.  There is a lot of traffic concentrated there.  That is where the regional wholesale market (Mercado Moshoqueque) is located.  The population is mostly concentrated in the marginal zones.

Jesús provideds cargo and passenger transportation service in a “mototaxi” (motorized vehicle that consists of a motorcycle with an attached cabin for transportation purposes).  He usually offers his service on the main streets in his district.  The income from this activity normally pays for his personal expenses and helps his family get ahead.

Excessive use of his vehicle has caused it to start having problems, which require urgent repair in order to guarantee that it runs correctly.  That is why he believes it is advisable to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 700 soles.

loans.use: Repair and maintenance expenses for his mototaxi

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy groceries to expand her business
